description:
Job Title: Growth Data Analyst




Location: Remote




About Us:

Flex AI is a leading platform dedicated to helping people achieve their fitness goals through personalized workout plans, nutrition guidance, and community support. Our mission is to make fitness accessible and enjoyable for everyone. Join our dynamic team and help us create innovative solutions that empower users to lead healthier lives!




 App: https://apps.apple.com/app/id1446354547

 Website: https://www.flexfitnessapp.com/

 A.I. Patent: https://patents.google.com/patent/WO2020252599A1/en




Position: Growth Data Analyst

Job Type: Full-Time




Responsibilities:

 * Analyze user data to identify growth opportunities and inform product development strategies.
 * Develop and maintain dashboards and reports to track key performance indicators (KPIs) and metrics.
 * Conduct A/B tests and other experiments to optimize user acquisition, retention, and engagement.
 * Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including product, marketing, and engineering, to implement data-driven insights and strategies.
 * Provide actionable recommendations based on data analysis to drive business growth and improve user experience.
 * Stay up-to-date with industry trends and best practices in data analysis and growth hacking.




Qualifications:

 * Bachelor’s degree in Data Science, Statistics, Computer Science, or a related field.
 * Minimum of 3-5 years of experience in data analysis, with a focus on growth and user engagement.
 * Proficiency in data analysis tools such as SQL, Python, R, or similar.
 * Strong understanding of statistical analysis and data visualization techniques.
 * Experience with A/B testing and other experimental methodologies.
 * Excellent communication and collaboration skills, with the ability to work effectively in a remote team environment.
 * A portfolio showcasing your best work, highlighting your ability to drive growth through data analysis.




Why Join Us:

 * Collaborative and inclusive work environment.
 * Competitive salary and benefits package.
 * Flexible working hours and remote work options.
 * Professional development opportunities and continuous learning.
title: Growth Data Analyst

description:

title: JUNIOR DATA ANALYST

description:
About us:

Portcast is a venture-backed Singapore based startup that develops predictive supply chain technology for the logistics industry. We’re focused on building the next-gen logistics operating system to predict how cargo moves across the world and enable data-driven supply chain planning. Based out of Singapore, we’ve been building together since 2018, and are backed by some of the major investors in the tech industry, we believe that the logistics industry is at the inflection point of large-scale digitization.

Our mission is to transform international supply chains to be more resilient by helping logistics companies realize the full potential of their data. We cater to both shipping lines and cargo airlines, covering 90% of the world trade volume that travels via ocean and 35% of world trade value that travels via air. We use proprietary machine learning algorithms and real-time external market data (such as economic indices, marine weather, satellite-based data, etc.) to predict how much cargo will be shipped, when it will arrive, and deliver actionable insights.

About the Role:

You will be joining the lean Analytics team in this critical role of data management, quality assurance, and analytics. You will work on a data-heavy product that offers our customers end-to-end visibility of their cargo at each step of the ocean movement. Our prediction engine answers when, where, why, and by how many days the container would be delayed. You will ensure that the data ingested in the model and shared with the customers is error-free and of the highest quality. You will own internal performance dashboards and automation processes.

The right candidate would have experience in data analysis roles, preferably in a startup environment, and possess a high level of ownership, efficiency, and a data-driven mindset. You will be analytical, comfortable with a fast-moving organization, and eager to collaborate with different teams to drive impact across the organization.

As a Data Analyst, you will:


 * Documentation, Reporting, Root Cause analysis of Prediction issues
 * Analyze ingested and system-generated data for anomalies and gaps
 * Refer to various data sources to plug those gaps
 * Create data stories and come up with possible solutions in terms of QA process flow change and/or automation. Own the subsequent plan and execution
 * Automation of Performance/Accuracy review processes, report generation, data visualization using Python, SQL
 * Support engineering and data science teams in system-level data fixes. Understand how the engine makes predictions, explore possible improvements in the process by fixing/introducing new data/features
 * Support the customer operations, marketing team in getting insights from the data, such as performance, accuracy metrics, impact of real-time events, etc. as required
 * Maintain, own internal and customer dashboards based on the trial/account requirements (e.g. prediction accuracy, timeliness, coverage, explainability)
   
   
   

To thrive in this role, you must have:


 * Bachelor's or Master’s degree in Computer Science, Engineering, Information Technology, or a related field
 * Prior experience in data analysis or data analyst roles, preferably in a startup environment
 * Exceptionally skilled in Python and SQL, with a demonstrated ability to consistently produce reusable and highly scalable code
 * An eye for detail: Looking for anomalies in the system
 * Familiarity with Linux, GitHub, product development
 * Proven experience with data visualization
 * Empathy and Urgency: to feel the customer pain and react promptly on a day-to-day basis
 * A Problem solver & go-getter: either programmatically or manually meeting customer expectations and delivering on time
 * Fluent with written and verbal in English
 * Strong ownership mindset, efficiency, and data-driven approach
 * Good to have: basic understanding of machine learning algorithms
   
   
   

If this role sounds like you, then we would love to hear from you to discuss this great opportunity!
sector: Transportation, Logistics, Supply Chain and Storage

description:
Job Description

As a member of the data and analytics team, the Business Intelligence Developer will work hand-in-hand with business stakeholders to assess needs and deliver data products that support and enhance decision-making. This individual will be well versed in data warehousing, data reporting, particularly with scripting languages such as SQL, and dashboard creation using visualization tools such as Power BI. This position will require a high degree of attention to detail along with ability to review calculations for quality assurance as well as solid communication and organization skills.

Roles, Responsibilities & Typical Activities

Ability to build Power BI Reports/Dashboards and reports by connecting to varied data sources

Estimate technical requirements and breaks down work to user stories and tasks

Design and work on proof of concepts that can be demonstrated to the customer

Perform Data Cleaning & Data Profiling

Optimize report performance

Prepare holistic documentations (process and technical) to enable proper knowledge transfer between both the data team as well as current/future users

Other reasonable duties as assigned

Your Skills And Experience

Qualifications / Experience

University or College degree, preferably major in Computer Science, Information Technology or related major

English level (CEFR) B2 or equivalent

Professional knowledge and skills

Ability to consult in interfacing with business stakeholders to determine needs organize and prioritize tasks

Must be detail oriented and able to problem solve

Have a strong sense of urgency and commitment to quality customer service is required

Must be team and service oriented

Data Analyze & Develop

Use existing aggregation tools (Excel, SQL, Data Warehouse) to prepare data

Use existing BI tools (Excel, Power BI, SQL) to gain insights into data

Use technical skills to elevate both the business & your teammates

Customer Service

Demonstrated internal customer service insights including the implementation of employee satisfaction charters.

Why you'll love working here

Extremely competitive salary.

13th month & productivity Bonus.

Yearly salary review.

Healthcare insurance package.

24/24 Personal accident insurance.

State-of-the-art office environment.

Yearly outing.

Detailed induction, training and on-going career development.

Opportunity for overseas training and travel.

English training programs.

5-day week.

Flexible start-times.

Free lunch.

Free parking.

Full Social Club including gym, zumba, yoga, football, badminton, swimming, tennis.
title: Data Analyst  (PowerBI)

description:
About Qode

At Qode, we revolutionize talent acquisition by leveraging data and automation. Our platform utilizes large language models (LLMs) to convert unstructured data into actionable insights, creating "Private Talent Pools" for recruiters. By automating recruiting workflows, we eliminate costs and significantly decrease time-to-hire. Our agents match profiles, find contacts, send messages, schedule interviews, and transcribe them for searchable data. We ensure high-quality hiring through automated technical assessments and detailed feedback for recruiters.

We are seeking a dynamic Data Anaylyst (Recruitment field) to oversee and manage the dashboards and operations of our recruitment services. This role is crucial for ensuring operational excellence and effective talent acquisition.

About The Job

As the Data Analyst, you will be responsible for managing the dashboards operations of our recruitment services. This position combines strategic oversight of operations with hands-on management of dashboards to ensure seamless service delivery and client satisfaction.

Responsibilities

Data Analysis:


 * Collect, analyze, and interpret recruitment data to provide actionable insights for the recruitment team and stakeholders, ensuring accuracy and relevance
 * Create and maintain recruitment dashboards and reports using data directly queried from the company's data warehouse and recruitment team's manual inputs
 * Monitor and maintain the accuracy of operational reports on recruitment, along with accounts and revenues management
 * Monitor key performance indicators (KPIs) and all accounts to produce reports upon requests
 * Ad-Hoc Analysis: Support recruitment team with data analysis as needed to meet immediate demands
 * Optimize report performance and process other reasonable duties as assigned
   
   

Operations:


 * Oversee the end-to-end operations of our recruitment services and products, ensuring efficiency and alignment with company goals
 * Oversee all clients' hiring needs and assign the job requirements among the Talent Partner team evenly and efficiently
 * Work closely with the Account Managers, Accountants and Admin for reviewing, drafting and processing global contracts and deals
 * Work closely with the Accountants and global Talent Partner Team Leads to ensure the process of timely invoice issuance and payment collection
 * Make, revise and update agreements and appendices upon requests
 * Develop and implement operational policies and procedures to enhance service delivery and optimize workflows
 * Ensure compliance with industry regulations and best practices in recruitment operations
   
   
   

Requirements


 * Bachelor's degree in Economics, Finance, Human Resources, Business Administration or a relevant field
 * Minimum of 1 year of experience in reporting/data analytics
 * Excellent verbal and written communication skills in English (must-have)
 * Proficient in using Excel/Google Sheet and data analytics for operational reporting
 * Experience in BI tools (Power BI, SQL) to gain insights into data
 * Experience in HR/HR Tech/Recruitment/Headhunting services is a plus
 * Understanding of recruitment processes and best practices is a plus
 * Experience in handling recruitment/headhunting agreements is a plus
 * Strong interpersonal skills and a can-do attitude
 * Ability to work efficiently under pressure and manage multiple priorities

description:
Yes4All is one of the leading brands for home sporting goods & furniture in the e-commerce market. Founded in 2010, we have strived to be the world leader in e-commerce enablers in terms of trading, product creating and e-commerce servicing. Based in California with an operation office in HCMC, we have young and talented members with expert knowledge and experience in the e-commerce industry.

We are on an ambitious journey to dominate not only US e-commerce market but also to enter new e-commerce markets of more than 15 countries in Europe, Asia and North America, not only Amazon channel but also Walmart, Wayfair among others. Besides, Home sporting goods, Furniture, Outdoor and Gardening are also great opportunities that we desire to occupy and create significant values. With our steady knowledge in E-commerce, Yes4All started to provide end-to-end ecommerce-enabler service in order to help Vietnamese and global manufacturers or struggling sellers bring their products to the US & International markets.

Our mission: Connect the Worldwide Resources & create innovative platform to bring products and services from innovators and manufacturers to worldwide customers more efficiently.

Our vision: To be the world leader of e-commerce enabler in term of trading, product creating, and e-commerce servicing.

For More Information


 * Website: https://yes4all.com/
 * LinkedIn: www.linkedin.com/company/yes4all-llc/
 * Facebook: www.facebook.com/Yes4AllVNCareers
   
   

Yes4All is strongly growing. On the way to become the world largest e-commerce enable platform, we are looking for talented candidates to join us.

I. JOB DISCRIPTION

Maintain and Modified Reports


 * Modified report by request.
 * Ensure accuracy and timeliness of reports.
   
   

Maintain Data Quality


 * Monitor and detect data issues, thereby creating automatic alert tools
   
   

Data processing


 * Aggregate, clean up data sources
   
   

Documentation


 * Create and maintain documents
   
   

Ii. Requirements


 * Bachelor’s degree in Data Analytics, Data Science, Computer Science, or a related field.
 * Can use SQL, Python, and visualization tools like Power BI.
 * Have good analytical and statistical skills
 * Have good communication and presentation abilities
 * Possess a “Can do” mindset
   
   

WHY YOU WILL LOVE JOINING US?

FOR YOU TO JOIN


 * Financial Well-being: A competitive salary with 13th month salary, annual performance bonus and a variety of allowances.
 * Salary review: annually or on excellent performance.
 * Activities: company trips, team-building, and other customized monthly bonding events.
 * Annual leaves: 16 days off and 01 Birthday Leave per year.
 * Healthcare: annual health check, insurance according to Labor Law and extra PTI Insurance package.
 * Working Environment: dynamic, friendly environments with working time flexibility (Mon-Fri), and other perks include snacks, coffee, and healthy food provided daily suited for hardworking, fun, and team collaboration.
   
   

FOR YOU TO GROW


 * Ambition: We are now keeping on with our hyper growth to multicategory, multichannel, multimarket, and expanding into the world largest e-commerce enabler. Hence, there will continuously be opportunities to challenge yourself, learn new skills and knowledge.
 * Challenges: Your voice can always be heard as we embrace the eagerness of learning and sharing. You can be your own boss and create your own value with the ability to take initiative and make decisions in all aspects of work.
 * Chances: Be led and coached by experienced and inspirational leaders and participate in various training courses where you can enlarge your knowledge and experience in the E-commerce and Supply Chain industry.
   
   

FOR YOU TO STAY


 * People: Having a headquarter in the US and an operation office in Vietnam, our team is young and highly motivated. You will be working with and alongside members having experiences from International Corporations or high profile from Vietnam that share the same passion and dedication.
 * Culture: Our working environment is humble, collaborative and 100% healthy. We promote Exchange & Speak out, you can receive transparent and supportive
 * Career path: Provide you a great career path, open to rotating for your better understanding of the company and contribute across many of our functions.
   
   

And much more, join us and let yourself explore other fantastic things!

title: Data Analyst Fresher

description:
1. Key Responsibilities

 * Data Reporting & Visualization: Develop and deliver Power BI dashboards and reports to support the BOM, business squads, and other internal departments. Provide actionable insights to improve business operations and decision-making.
 * Data Analysis: Utilize Python, SQL, and other tools to gather, analyze, and interpret large, complex datasets, ensuring data accuracy and consistency.
 * Internal Reporting: Produce regular and ad-hoc internal reports to track key performance indicators (KPIs) and other business metrics.
 * API Integration: Collaborate with other technical teams to provide data through API integrations for cross-departmental access and automation.
 * Cross-Departmental Collaboration: Work closely with stakeholders across different teams to understand data requirements and provide customized analytical solutions.
 * Data Quality: Ensure data integrity by implementing validation procedures and maintaining high standards for data accuracy.
 * Process Optimization: Identify opportunities to improve data processes, reporting, and workflows through automation or enhanced data management practices.




2. Required Skills & Qualifications

Technical Expertise

 * Advanced proficiency in Power BI for building reports, dashboards, and data visualizations.
 * Strong skills in SQL for querying, managing, and analyzing large datasets.
 * Experience with Python for data analysis, automation, and scripting.
 * Hands-on experience with AWS Redshift and AWS Lake for data storage, querying, and integration.

Analytical Skills

 * Strong ability to analyze complex data sets and translate them into actionable business insights.
 * Prior experience working with financial or stock market data.

Communication

 * Excellent verbal and written communication skills, with the ability to explain technical data to non-technical stakeholders.
 * Ability to collaborate effectively across multiple departments.
 * Detail-Oriented: Strong focus on accuracy and quality in all data-related tasks.
 * Problem-Solving: Demonstrated ability to troubleshoot data-related issues and improve processes.

Experience

 * 3-5 years of experience as a Data Analyst, preferably in the banking or finance industry.
 * Familiarity with stock market data, financial reporting, or securities-related analysis is highly desirable.
 * Education: Bachelor's degree in Data Science, Computer Science, Finance, Mathematics, or a related field.
 * CFA Level 1 Passed is a plus, demonstrating a foundational understanding of investment analysis and financial markets.

title: Data Analyst

description:
We are seeking a skilled and motivated Data Analyst to join our team. The successful candidate will be responsible for collecting, analyzing, and interpreting large sets of data to identify trends and insights. The Data Analyst will work closely with the business stakeholders to understand their needs, analyze large datasets to find improvement opportunities, and provide actionable recommendations for Business stakeholders.

Job Responsibilities:


 * Collect, analyze and interpret large sets of data using statistical methods and data analysis tools
 * Collaborate with business stakeholders to identify the improvement opportunities
 * Draw conclusions from findings from data analysis & recommend actionable strategies to the Business stakeholders
 * Develop and maintain data analysis documentation based on findings
 * Continuously monitor data quality and identify opportunities for data quality improvements.
 * Strong written and verbal communication - to communicate across business lines and be able to communicate with non-native data stakeholders
 * Create and maintain data sets, reports, and dashboards to support business decisions and performance tracking.
 * Work with data structures and metadata to ensure consistency, security, and accessibility.
   
   
   

Requirements


 * Bachelor's degree in Mathematics, Computer Science, Economics, or related fields
 * 2+ years experienced as a data analyst, having actual impact on business based on insight is preferred
 * Strong SQL, Python or Pyspark with the ability to learn
 * Fluent in English (Interviews will be conducted in English)
 * Proven analytic skills, including reporting, mining, evaluation, analysis, and visualization
 * Technical writing experience in relevant areas, including queries, reports, and presentations
   
   
   

Preferred Qualifications:


 * At least 2 years working in a data analytics reporting role
 * Background in statistics and business/data modeling
   
   
   

Benefits


 * Meal and parking allowance are covered by the company
 * Full benefits and salary rank during probation
 * Insurances as Vietnamese labor law and premium health care for you and your family without seniority compulsory
 * Performance bonus up to 2 months
 * 13th month salary pro-rata
 * 15-day annual leave+ 3-day sick leave + 1 birthday leave + 1 Christmas leave
 * SMART goals and clear career opportunities (technical seminar, conference, and career talk) - we focus on your development
 * Values-driven, international working environment, and agile culture
 * Overseas travel opportunities for training and working related
 * Internal Hackathons and company's events (team building, coffee run, blue card...)
 * Work-life balance 40-hr per week from Mon to Fri

title: Data Analyst

description:
Job Description

About this role

As a data scientist you will apply advanced analytical techniques to large and complex datasets to generate insights and solutions for business problems.

About Our Team

Our global AI, Data & Analytics Division at Renesas is experiencing an increasing demand for AI and Generative AI (LLM) based solutions. Working closely with our business partners, we deliver AI solutions to help drive value for Renesas at a global enterprise scale.We are seeking passionate candidates that will thrive as part of a global team of technologists that love empowering customers, collaborating with teammates, and using the latest AI and Data technologies.

Responsibilities


 * Preprocess structured and unstructured data for approaches such as RAG architecture.
 * Aggregate, clean, and analyze data from various sources using Databricks tools and frameworks.
 * Provide detailed data insights.
 * Collaborate with other data scientists, data engineers, and domain experts on cross-functional projects using Databricks Workspaces.
 * Keep up to date with the latest developments and trends in data science and Databricks technologies.
   
   

Qualifications

Must Have


 * Bachelor's degree or higher in computer science, statistics, mathematics, or a related field.
 * Proficiency in data engineering including data preprocessing for RAG, data platforms, and analytics with a strong track record of successful projects and in-depth knowledge of industry best practices.
 * Strong statistical analysis skills.
 * Proficient in Python, R, SQL, and other programming languages for data analysis and manipulation.
 * Familiarity with Databricks products and services.
 * Have working knowledge of CI/CD.
 * Strong communication, documentation, and white-boarding skills.
 * Creative, curious, and problem-solving mindset.
   
   

Strongly Preferred


 * Databricks certifications.
 * Experience working with Databricks products.
 * Working knowledge of at least one major cloud ecosystem (AWS, Azure, or GCP). Azure is preferred.
 * Knowledge in LLM actual use cases.
 * Experience working with a geographically distributed and cross-functional team including systems integrators and third-party companies.
   
   

Additional Information

Renesas is an embedded semiconductor solution provider driven by its purpose ‘To Make Our Lives Easier.’ As the industry’s leading expert in embedded processing with unmatched quality and system-level know-how, we have evolved to provide scalable and comprehensive semiconductor solutions based on the broadest product portfolio, including High Performance Computing, Embedded Processing, Analog & Connectivity, and Power.

With a diverse team of over 21,000 professionals in more than 30 countries, we continue to expand our boundaries to offer enhanced user experiences through digitalization and usher into a new era of innovation. We remain agile and fearless as we accelerate our growth, encouraging everyone to play an active role with an entrepreneurial mindset and accountability.

At Renesas, You Can


 * Launch and advance your career in technical and business roles across four Product Groups and various corporate functions. You will have the opportunities to explore our hardware and software capabilities and try new things.
 * Make a real impact by developing automotive, industrial, infrastructure, IoT, and sustainable products and solutions to meet our customers’ evolving needs and help people and communities thrive tomorrow.
 * Maximize your performance and wellbeing in our flexible and inclusive work environment. Our people-first culture and global support system, including the remote work option and Employee Resource Groups (ERGs), will help you excel from the first day.
   
   

Are you ready to own your success and make your mark?

Join Renesas. Let’s Shape the Future together.

Renesas Electronics is an equal opportunity and affirmative action employer, committed to supporting diversity and fostering a work environment free of discrimination on the basis of sex, race, religion, national origin, gender, gender identity, gender expression, age, sexual orientation, military status, veteran status, or any other basis protected by law. For more information, please read our Diversity & Inclusion Statement.

title: Data Scientist

description:
Job Description:

 * Business Partnership: Proactively engage with internal business teams to understand their data requirements and translate business questions into analytical solutions.
 * Advanced Analytics: Conduct in-depth data analysis to identify trends, patterns, and opportunities. Develop and implement advanced analytical models to address complex business challenges.
 * Insight Generation: Deliver actionable insights to business stakeholders & BI Heads, through clear and effective communication.
 * Project Management: Own end-to-end data projects, from defining the scope to delivering results. Build frameworks and trackers to monitor project progress and ensure timely delivery.
 * Stakeholder Management: Build strong relationships with stakeholders across the organization. Effectively communicate complex data findings to both technical and non-technical audiences.
 * Data Solution Development: Design, implement, and maintain a self-service data platform that enables ad-hoc access to large datasets, empowering business users to conduct their own analyses.
 * Continuous Improvement: Proactively identify opportunities to improve data quality, efficiency, and effectiveness. Stay up-to-date with the latest data technologies and trends.




Requirements:

 * At least 3+ years of working experience in DA, BI, CMI, or market research, preferably at tech companies.
 * A curious mindset with a passion for data and problem-solving.
 * Strong analytical skills with a proven ability to translate data into actionable insights.
 * Strong business acumen with a desire to understand the eCommerce industry.
 * Proficiency in SQL.
 * Experience with data modeling and analytical frameworks.
 * Experience in Python and other similar languages & tools
 * Prior experience with database and model design and segmentation techniques
title: Senior Business Intelligence Analyst

description:
Overview

Momos is a rapidly growing company with its headquarters in Singapore and the United States. As part of our company's growth strategy, we are actively expanding our operations in the APAC region. Our main mission is to help our brands create happier customers at every location with AI.

Momos is the Customer Experience Management Platform for multi-location brands. We work with groups such as Shake Shack and Baskin Robbins to power the entire lifecycle and automate everything with AI. Today, we are proud to be trusted by over 5,000 businesses globally. If you love to hustle and want to work for a mission-driven company, we would be thrilled to have you join our team.

The Role:

Momos is seeking a highly motivated individual to join our Data Analytics team, playing a pivotal role in empowering our customers to optimize operations through insightful data-driven recommendations. Utilizing Artificial Intelligence (AI), you will be responsible for designing and implementing predictive data products, specifically focusing on social media, digital marketing, and market research. Working closely with the Data Head and cross-functional teams, you will contribute to building the next-generation data platform for our fast-paced, early-stage startup.

Primary Roles & Responsibilities:


 * Collaborate with Operations, Product, and Data Engineering teams to design and implement scalable analytics and reporting solutions
 * Partner with Data Engineering to develop core datasets for operational and exploratory analysis
 * Query, transform, and analyse large datasets
 * Construct rich and dynamic dashboards using in-house tools and third-party solutions like Tableau
 * Train and leverage Generative AI models to develop data products for internal and external use cases
 * Automate solutions where appropriate
   
   
   

Additional Responsibilities:


 * Leverage extensive volumes of structured and unstructured data to enhance customer business performance
 * Manage end-to-end deployment of data projects across various functions and stakeholders
 * Develop a profound understanding of data models, business domains, and support data quality for allocated areas of ownership
 * Build dynamic dashboards using in-house and third-party tools, aligning with business requirements
   
   
   

Requirements

Ideal Background:


 * Bachelor's or Master's degree in a quantitative discipline (e.g., Mathematics/Statistics, Actuarial Sciences, Computer Science, Engineering, or other data science disciplines)
 * 2-4 years of experience in a highly quantitative role
 * Self-driven team player with the ability to quickly learn and apply new tools and techniques
 * High proficiency in Python, SQL, and data visualization tools such as Tableau
 * Excellent communication skills in both technical and non-scientific language for effective collaboration with business stakeholders
 * Working knowledge of Generative AI and have used / deployed LLM models in production
   
   
   

Nice to Haves:


 * Experience in developing internal or external data products
 * Alignment with executive-level stakeholders
 * Working experience in public cloud infrastructure & tools such as AWS (e.g. S3, Lambda, and EC2) and/or GCP (e.g. BigQuery, Compute Engine)
 * Domain expertise in the Adtech industry
 * Domain expertise in F&B technology
   
   
   

Location:


 * Ho Chi Minh city, Vietnam
   
   
   

Benefits


 * Comprehensive social insurance coverage in accordance with Vietnamese labor regulations, encompassing full salary benefits
 * Private Health Insurance
 * 15 days Paid Time Off annually
   
   
   

Cultural Values


 * Mission-driven and fast-paced, entrepreneurial environment
 * A collaborative and flat company culture
 * Comprehensive private health insurance
 * Discretionary trips to our offices across the globe, with global travel medical insurance (when it's safe to travel!)
 * Cross-cultural team bonding/networking
 * Love Food? Join our Team!
   
   
   

Equal Opportunity

Momos is an equal opportunity workplace where we embrace diversity and different cultures. We started as an international Company, and know that building an organization with different experiences, thoughts and opinions allows our team to grow and excel.

description:
We are looking for a talented and experienced AI Researcher/Data Scientist to join our team. As a AI Researcher at Kyanon Digital, you would bring academic specialities to solve practical business problems with a strong focus on state-of-the-art Deep Learning technologies, work closely with cross-functional teams to propose solutions and contribute to building cutting-edge Machine Learning products.




YOU WILL MAKE YOUR IMPACT BY

 * Collecting, cleaning, and analyzing data to identify trends and patterns;
 * Researching and building, optimizing state-of-the-art model to solve real-world problems;
 * Working with AI Engineers and Data Engineers to build model and data pipelines;
 * Collaborating with Product Managers and other stakeholders to define and execute data-driven decision making;
 * Developing consistent and sustainable MLOps system;
 * Managing and supervising young researchers to conduct innovative research and submit publications;
 * Using data to build reports and dashboards that communicate insights to stakeholders.




WHAT YOU NEED TO MAXIMIZE YOUR CONTRIBUTION

 * 5 years of experiences as a Data Scientist, Computer Scientists, AI Researcher
 * Location requirement: based in Ho Chi MInh City is a MUST
 * Experience with Python programming
 * Strong experience in Deep Learning frameworks: Pytorch / Keras / Tensorflow
 * Fluent English (both written & verbal)
 * Strong problem-solving and analytical skills and attention to detail.




It's also a huge advantage if you have:

 * Experience in Computer Vision fields
 * Master's degree in Computer Science, Statistics, Mathematics, or related fields.
 * Papers published on reputable conferences and journals (NeurIPS, ICLR, ICML, AAAI, KDD)
 * Experience with MLOps libraries (Airflow, MLFlow, BentoML, Feast, etc.) and CI/CD (Jenkins, etc.)
 * Experience with Docker and cloud-based AI services such as AWS, Azure, or Google Cloud

description:
ABOUT THE BRAND:

Callaway Golf is the leading manufacturer of premium golf clubs, balls, performance gear and accessories worldwide. Through an unwavering commitment to innovation, we push the limits of performance and create demonstrably superior products designed to make every golfer a better golfer.




Our company is a blend of experience and diverse backgrounds, and together we look to move the game forward, and we want top-notch people to join us in that mission!




By joining Callaway Golf, you also join part of the portfolio of brands within Topgolf Callaway Brands, an unrivaled tech-enabled Modern Golf and active lifestyle company delivering leading golf equipment, apparel, and entertainment, with a portfolio of global brands including Topgolf, Callaway Golf, TravisMathew, Toptracer, Odyssey, OGIO, Jack Wolfskin, and World Golf Tour (“WGT”). “Modern Golf” is the dynamic and inclusive ecosystem that includes both on-course and off-course golf. For more information, please visit https://www.topgolfcallawaybrands.com

JOB OVERVIEW

Responsible for the design and development of data visualizations and dashboards using data sets from various sources and maintenance. Explore the opportunities of business reports enrichment. Creating informative and user-friendly format to help organization making make data-driven decisions, optimize processes, evaluate performance, and drive growth.




ROLES AND RESPONSIBILITIES

 * Collect, clean and prepare data for visualization.
 * Utilize data manipulation languages to extract and manipulate data from various sources.
 * Design, develop, and maintain reports and dashboards clear, concise and informative, providing actionable insights to support decision-making processes across the organization.
 * Manage and track the KPI’s for internal & external, maintain dashboards and share with key stakeholders in regular basis to enhance data transparency.
 * Strive for excellence in the reporting formats and the process of collecting/ reporting data by enhancing exiting tools and creating new tools.
 * Perform data analysis to uncover trends, patterns, and insights that can influence strategic decisions.
 * Proactively offer a clear point of view regarding updates, revisions or new reporting formats that will lead to a continuous improvement of our processes.
 * Data entry might be required as part of data migration.
 * Plus, any other requirements as directed by Management.




TECHNICAL COMPETENCIES (Knowledge, Skills & Abilities)

 * 2+ years of experience in data analytics and management or a related role, with a proven track record of delivering high-quality reports and insights.
 * Experience in data visualization techniques, data modeling, and ETL processes is highly desirable.
 * Knowledge and awareness of Manufacturing/ Supply Chain Management.
 * Strong knowledge and experience with Power BI/ DAX and other Power Platform products.
 * Proficiency in data manipulation and analysis, statistical techniques, and analytical tools (Excel/ Power Query, R/ Python/ SQL, …).
 * Experience with SAP/ SAP Business Objects, Centric PLM is a plus.
 * Experience with Snowflake is a plus.
 * Good project management skills with the ability to handle multiple projects.
 * Strong problem-solving, decision-making, and critical thinking skills.
 * Ability to collaborate and work well with a variety of stakeholders.
 * Organized, focus and diligent work habits.
 * Strong communication skills, both verbal and written, fluent in English, with the ability to convey complex data insights to non-technical stakeholders.
 * Enjoy working in a multicultural environment.




EDUCATION AND EXPERIENCE

 * Bachelor’s or Master’s in Data Science, Engineering, Business, or a related field. Certifications in relevant areas of data analytics are considered a plus.
 * Proficient with Microsoft Suite and analytical tools.
 * Proven experience with ERP systems, ideally with SAP; Centric PLM.




PHYSICAL REQUIREMENTS / WORK ENVIRONMENT (if applicable)

 * Work is performed in a designated professional office workstation and environment.
 * Extensive use of office equipment to include computer, calculator, copier, fax, and other business-related machines and software.
 * Travel domestically and internationally should be expected.




DISCLAIMER

This job description indicates in general terms, the type and level of work performed as well as the typical responsibilities of employees in this classification and it may be changed by management at any time. Other duties may also apply. Nothing in this position description changes the at-will employment relationship existing between the Company and its employees. Distribution of this item outside of the Company without an authorized release is a violation of Company policy.




#LI-TN1

DE&I and EEOC:

Inclusion & Diversity: As a purpose-led, performance driven company, we strive to foster a culture of belonging based on respect, connection, openness and authenticity. We are committed to building and maintaining a workplace that celebrates the diversity of our associates, supporting them to bring their authentic selves to work every day.




If your experience is close to what we’re looking for, please consider applying. Experience comes in many forms, skills are transferable, and passion goes a long way. We know that diverse backgrounds and experiences make for the best problem-solving and creative thinking, which is why we’re dedicated to adding new perspectives to the team and encourage everyone to apply. We look forward to learning more about you.




ARE YOU READY TO MAKE THE TURN? APPLY TODAY!

description:
Yes4All is one of the leading brands for home sporting goods & furniture in the e-commerce market. Founded in 2010, we have strived to be the world leader in e-commerce enablers in terms of trading, product creating and e-commerce servicing. Based in California with an operation office in HCMC, we have young and talented members with expert knowledge and experience in the e-commerce industry.

We are on an ambitious journey to dominate not only US e-commerce market but also to enter new e-commerce markets of more than 15 countries in Europe, Asia and North America, not only Amazon channel but also Walmart, Wayfair among others. Besides, Home sporting goods, Furniture, Outdoor and Gardening are also great opportunities that we desire to occupy and create significant values. With our steady knowledge in E-commerce, Yes4All started to provide end-to-end ecommerce-enabler service in order to help Vietnamese and global manufacturers or struggling sellers bring their products to the US & International markets.

Our mission: Connect the Worldwide Resources & create innovative platform to bring products and services from innovators and manufacturers to worldwide customers more efficiently.

Our vision: To be the world leader of e-commerce enabler in term of trading, product creating, and e-commerce servicing.

For More Information


 * Website: https://yes4all.com/
 * LinkedIn: www.linkedin.com/company/yes4all-llc/
 * Facebook: www.facebook.com/Yes4AllVNCareers
   
   

Yes4All is strongly growing. On the way to become the world largest e-commerce enable platform, we are looking for talented candidates to join us.

I. Job Description

Develop and Maintain BI Reports


 * Design and create regular and ad-hoc reports as assigned.
 * Ensure accuracy and timeliness of reports.
   
   

Maintain Data Quality


 * Monitor and ensure data quality standards.
 * Address data discrepancies and issues.
   
   

Develop Data Models


 * Create and maintain data models for reporting and analysis.
   
   

Documentation


 * Create and maintain BI’s documents
   
   

Ii. Requirements


 * Bachelor’s degree in Business Analytics, Data Science, Computer Science, or a related field.
 * Can use SQL, Python and visualization tool like Power BI.
 * Have good analytical and statistical skills
 * Have good communication and presentation abilities
 * Possess “Can do” mindset
   
   

WHY YOU WILL LOVE JOINING US?

FOR YOU TO JOIN


 * Financial Well-being: A competitive salary with 13th month salary, annual performance bonus and a variety of allowances.
 * Salary review: annually or on excellent performance.
 * Activities: company trips, team-building, and other customized monthly bonding events.
 * Annual leaves: 16 days off and 01 Birthday Leave per year.
 * Healthcare: annual health check, insurance according to Labor Law and extra PTI Insurance package.
 * Working Environment: dynamic, friendly environments with working time flexibility (Mon-Fri), and other perks include snacks, coffee, and healthy food provided daily suited for hardworking, fun, and team collaboration.
   
   

FOR YOU TO GROW


 * Ambition: We are now keeping on with our hyper growth to multicategory, multichannel, multimarket, and expanding into the world largest e-commerce enabler. Hence, there will continuously be opportunities to challenge yourself, learn new skills and knowledge.
 * Challenges: Your voice can always be heard as we embrace the eagerness of learning and sharing. You can be your own boss and create your own value with the ability to take initiative and make decisions in all aspects of work.
 * Chances: Be led and coached by experienced and inspirational leaders and participate in various training courses where you can enlarge your knowledge and experience in the E-commerce and Supply Chain industry.
   
   

FOR YOU TO STAY


 * People: Having a headquarter in the US and an operation office in Vietnam, our team is young and highly motivated. You will be working with and alongside members having experiences from International Corporations or high profile from Vietnam that share the same passion and dedication.
 * Culture: Our working environment is humble, collaborative and 100% healthy. We promote Exchange & Speak out, you can receive transparent and supportive
 * Career path: Provide you a great career path, open to rotating for your better understanding of the company and contribute across many of our functions.
   
   

And much more, join us and let yourself explore other fantastic things!

description:
Job Title: Growth Data Analyst




Location: Remote




About Us:

Flex AI is a leading platform dedicated to helping people achieve their fitness goals through personalized workout plans, nutrition guidance, and community support. Our mission is to make fitness accessible and enjoyable for everyone. Join our dynamic team and help us create innovative solutions that empower users to lead healthier lives!




 App: https://apps.apple.com/app/id1446354547

 Website: https://www.flexfitnessapp.com/

 A.I. Patent: https://patents.google.com/patent/WO2020252599A1/en




Position: Growth Data Analyst

Job Type: Full-Time




Responsibilities:

 * Analyze user data to identify growth opportunities and inform product development strategies.
 * Develop and maintain dashboards and reports to track key performance indicators (KPIs) and metrics.
 * Conduct A/B tests and other experiments to optimize user acquisition, retention, and engagement.
 * Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including product, marketing, and engineering, to implement data-driven insights and strategies.
 * Provide actionable recommendations based on data analysis to drive business growth and improve user experience.
 * Stay up-to-date with industry trends and best practices in data analysis and growth hacking.




Qualifications:

 * Bachelor’s degree in Data Science, Statistics, Computer Science, or a related field.
 * Minimum of 3-5 years of experience in data analysis, with a focus on growth and user engagement.
 * Proficiency in data analysis tools such as SQL, Python, R, or similar.
 * Strong understanding of statistical analysis and data visualization techniques.
 * Experience with A/B testing and other experimental methodologies.
 * Excellent communication and collaboration skills, with the ability to work effectively in a remote team environment.
 * A portfolio showcasing your best work, highlighting your ability to drive growth through data analysis.




Why Join Us:

 * Collaborative and inclusive work environment.
 * Competitive salary and benefits package.
 * Flexible working hours and remote work options.
 * Professional development opportunities and continuous learning.
title: Growth Data Analyst

description:
We're looking for an AI/ML engineer with mid-level experience who has worked with Python, Pytorch or Tensorflow. Our team handles multiple projects using cutting-edge models in LLM, NLP, computer vision, among others.

Location: Ho Chi Minh, Da Nang, Hanoi


What You'll Be Doing


 * Collaborate with stakeholders to analyze and apply AI/ML to existing systems
 * Research and evaluate different state-of-the-art AI/ML models
 * Obtain and prepare datasets for training and fine-tuning
 * Optimize inference performance for production deployment
 * Deploy, monitor, and maintain production AI/ML systems
   
   
   

Requirements


Must have


 * Good understanding of Machine Learning and Deep Learning
 * Good understanding of fundamental concepts and models such as Embedding, Transformer, CNN, GAN, and others
 * At least 2 years of experience with Python
 * At least 1 year of experience with one of the frameworks such as Pytorch or Tensorflow
 * Experience with data processing and visualization with Pyspark, Numpy, Pandas, Matplotlib or Seaborn
 * Experience with working on production AI systems.
 * Experience with large AI model training
 * Experience with noSQL and SQL databases
 * Knowing how to deploy the models
 * Excellent written and verbal communication skills in English
   
   
   

Nice to have


 * Experience with latest trending models (LLMs, diffusion models)
 * Have a solid foundation in Mathematics
 * Experience with MLops (model deployments, auto evaluation, monitor and detect model drifts...)
 * Experience with Agile process and Scrum methodologies
 * Experience with API development
 * Experience with cloud platforms like Azure, AWS or GCP
   
   
   

Benefits


 * Three days remote every week and four full remote weeks per year
 * Gold level Health Insurance coverage from Bao Viet Insurance, a yearly complete Health Check and social insurance
 * All office benefits and full salary during probation
 * Flexible working time starting anytime up to 10 AM working Monday - Friday with no overtime and a long lunch break
 * Allowance for everything: meals, parking, petrol, along with unlimited snacks and nice coffee every day
 * Choose from a brand-new Mac or PC device
 * Salary review twice a year with opportunities for promotions and spot awards
 * 12 days annual leave per year, with all days not taken paid out in cash, plus 2 sick leave days.
 * Yearly Training Budget up to 5 million VND per staff. On top of that, Professional coaching program, buddy system, tech talks, agile sessions, and 1on1 private English classes are available
 * Yearly company trip, monthly activities, , and other Celebrations for special days in the year, such as Women's Day, YEP, and Christmas
 * Employee-led clubs within the company; games teams, sports teams, etc
 * Modern open-space office with comfortable workspace, a PS5 games room, and chill-out areas

description:
Job Description

About this role

As an AI/ML Engineer, you will design and develop scalable and reliable artificial intelligence and machine learning models for various domains and applications.

About Our Team

Our global AI, Data & Analytics Division at Renesas is experiencing an increasing demand for AI and Generative AI (LLM) based solutions. Working closely with our business partners, we deliver AI solutions to help drive value for Renesas at a global enterprise scale. We are seeking passionate candidates that will thrive as part of a global team of technologists that love empowering customers, collaborating with teammates, and using the latest AI and Data technologies.

Responsibilities


 * Develop AI and LLM solutions based on business requirements using approaches such as RAG architecture on enterprise data.
 * Train, evaluate, and deploy AI/ML models using Databricks.
 * Prepare and augment training datasets for models.
 * Collaborate with data scientists and Full stack ai engineers, and domain experts on cross-functional projects using Databricks Workspaces.
 * Research and evaluate new AI/ML technologies and Databricks best practices.
   
   

Qualifications

Must Have


 * Bachelor's degree or higher in computer science, statistics, mathematics, or a related field.
 * Experience with the latest techniques in LLM, LVM, RAG, fine-tuning, and deploying with tools such as HuggingFace, Langchain, and foundation models.
 * 2+ years of hands-on development experience, using typical machine learning and data science tools such as pandas, scikit-learn, and TensorFlow/PyTorch.
 * Familiarity with Databricks products and services.
 * Have working knowledge of CI/CD.
 * Strong communication, documentation, and white-boarding skills.
 * Strong interest in collaboration, learning, and driving value through ML
   
   

Strongly Preferred


 * Databricks certifications.
 * Experience in building and deploying AI/ML models using Databricks products.
 * Working knowledge of at least one major cloud ecosystem (AWS, Azure, or GCP). Azure is preferred.
 * Knowledge in LLM actual use cases.
 * Experience working with a geographically distributed and cross-functional team including systems integrators and third-party companies
   
   

Additional Information

Renesas is an embedded semiconductor solution provider driven by its purpose ‘To Make Our Lives Easier.’ As the industry’s leading expert in embedded processing with unmatched quality and system-level know-how, we have evolved to provide scalable and comprehensive semiconductor solutions based on the broadest product portfolio, including High Performance Computing, Embedded Processing, Analog & Connectivity, and Power.

With a diverse team of over 21,000 professionals in more than 30 countries, we continue to expand our boundaries to offer enhanced user experiences through digitalization and usher into a new era of innovation. We remain agile and fearless as we accelerate our growth, encouraging everyone to play an active role with an entrepreneurial mindset and accountability.

At Renesas, You Can


 * Launch and advance your career in technical and business roles across four Product Groups and various corporate functions. You will have the opportunities to explore our hardware and software capabilities and try new things.
 * Make a real impact by developing automotive, industrial, infrastructure, IoT, and sustainable products and solutions to meet our customers’ evolving needs and help people and communities thrive tomorrow.
 * Maximize your performance and wellbeing in our flexible and inclusive work environment. Our people-first culture and global support system, including the remote work option and Employee Resource Groups (ERGs), will help you excel from the first day.
   
   

Are you ready to own your success and make your mark?

Join Renesas. Let’s Shape the Future together.

Renesas Electronics is an equal opportunity and affirmative action employer, committed to supporting diversity and fostering a work environment free of discrimination on the basis of sex, race, religion, national origin, gender, gender identity, gender expression, age, sexual orientation, military status, veteran status, or any other basis protected by law. For more information, please read our Diversity & Inclusion Statement.

description:
Job description:

• Collect, clean, and organize large data from diverse sources, employing SQL, Python, and other tools.

• Apply advanced statistical techniques to analyze large datasets, identifying patterns and correlations.

• Translate complex findings into clear, actionable insights for non-technical stakeholders.

• Create reports and analysis data daily and provide deeper insights to stakeholders.

• Create compelling data visualizations and reports using tools like Tableau or Power BI.

• Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define data requirements and support data-driven projects.

• Develop predictive models to forecast trends and outcomes based on historical data.

• Ensure data accuracy and integrity through rigorous validation processes.

• Identifies problems and presents written solutions ensuring accuracy and validity of information.

• Analyzing data to identify potential risks/opportunity and trends and work with stakeholders to come up with recommendations to inform decision making.




Job requirements:

• Bachelor's degree in Mathematics, Finance, Statistics, Economics is preferable.

• Open to relocating to Manila, Philippines.

• Proficiency in English communication.

• Strong understanding of statistical techniques, hypothesis testing, and probability.

• Experience with data visualization tools such as Power BI. Tableau is a plus.

• Proficiency in programming languages like Python or R for data analysis is a plus.

• Exceptional problem-solving skills and attention to detail.

• Excellent communication skills to convey insights to non-technical stakeholders.




Benefits:

 * Relocation Flight Ticket & Transportation
 * Company Accommodation/Housing Allowance
 * Annual leave: 24 days
 * Medical Leave: 10 days
 * Medical & Insurance Coverage
 * Daily Meals (on-duty)
 * Flight Ticket
 * Online/Onsite Trainings & Career Development

description:
Who are we?

Amaris Consulting is an independent technology consulting firm providing guidance and solutions to businesses. With more than 1,000 clients across the globe, we have been rolling out solutions in major projects for over a decade – this is made possible by an international team of 7,600 people spread across 5 continents and more than 60 countries. Our solutions focus on four different Business Lines: Information System & Digital, Telecom, Life Sciences and Engineering. We’re focused on building and nurturing a top talent community where all our team members can achieve their full potential. Amaris is your steppingstone to cross rivers of change, meet challenges and achieve all your projects with success.

At Amaris, we strive to provide our candidates with the best possible recruitment experience. We like to get to know our candidates, challenge them, and be able to give them proper feedback as quickly as possible. Here's what our recruitment process looks like:

Brief Call: Our process typically begins with a brief virtual/phone conversation to get to know you! The objective? Learn about you, understand your motivations, and make sure we have the right job for you!

Interviews (the average number of interviews is 3 - the number may vary depending on the level of seniority required for the position). During the interviews, you will meet people from our team: your line manager of course, but also other people related to your future role. We will talk in depth about you, your experience, and skills, but also about the position and what will be expected of you. Of course, you will also get to know Amaris: our culture, our roots, our teams, and your career opportunities!

Case study: Depending on the position, we may ask you to take a test. This could be a role play, a technical assessment, a problem-solving scenario, etc.

As you know, every person is different and so is every role in a company. That is why we have to adapt accordingly, and the process may differ slightly at times. However, please know that we always put ourselves in the candidate's shoes to ensure they have the best possible experience.

We look forward to meeting you!

Job Description

ABOUT THE JOB



 * Implement open-source AI models (text and image) from platforms such as HuggingFace and LangChain.
 * Develop and deploy AI-driven applications using Python.
 * Integrate AI models into internal engineering projects.
 * Optimize model performance and troubleshoot deployment issues.
 * Document processes, best practices, and technical solutions.
   
   
   

About You



 * Bachelor’s degree in computer science or related major.
 * Experience implementing open-source AI models in professional projects.
 * Proficiency in Python programming.
 * Familiarity with platforms like HuggingFace and LangChain.
 * Understanding of AI model integration into applications.
 * You demonstrate a strong ability to learn and adapt to new technologies.
   
   
   

Benefits



 * 13th-month salary
 * 14+ annual leaves per year
 * Premium healthcare insurance, starting from your probation period
 * Project reviews and yearly performance appraisals
 * Annual company trips
 * Teambuilding activities: Team lunch/dinner, events, and celebrations, sports clubs (football, yoga, badminton, etc.)
 * International team with flexible working time + hybrid working
 * Tailor-made career path
 * Technical workshops and training courses
 * Mobility: Opportunities to be on-site abroad in our offices in over 60+ countries
   
   
   

Equal Opportunity

Amaris Consulting is proud to be an equal-opportunity workplace. We are committed to promoting diversity within the workforce and creating an inclusive working environment. For this purpose, we welcome applications from all qualified candidates, regardless of gender, sexual orientation, race, ethnicity, beliefs, age, marital status, disability, or other characteristics.

description:
The PDA Center of GHTK is looking for candidates for the position of Data Analyst with the following job description:

I. RESPONSIBILITIES

– Build and manage a reporting system;

– Build a datamart to serve specific business needs;

– Identify and modify reports as required;

– Analyze data on internal product quality, thereby making recommendations to improve product quality;

– Monitor and ensure the quality and accuracy of data used in reports and internal products;

– Combine with other professional departments to deploy and optimize product data;

– Serve as an advocate of our data-driven culture;

– Work with other members (Data Engineer, Business Analyst) to implement, integrate, and optimize our existing systems.

II. REQUIREMENTS

– Have a Bachelor’s degree in Information Systems, Information Management, or Information Technology and Minimum 1 years of working experience in the field of data analysis;

– Demonstrate competency in handling large data sets and relational databases.

– Experience scripting with SQL, Spark, and R/ Python.

– Possess logical thinking, detail-oriented, strong organizational skills, ability to multi-task and work independently under tight deadlines.

– Work experience as a data analyst is a plus.

– Work experience working with distributed systems is a plus.

III. BENEFITS

– Competitive salary: $400-$2000 (Negotiable, and periodically reviewed based on your capacity).

– Truly cares about you and your experience at GHTK – Rewards and Promotions are available on special occasions.

– Attractive insurance package – You will be provided with a package of premium health insurance, along with other benefits by Vietnam Labour Law: Health Insurance, Social Insurance,…

– Special and worthy welfare regimes – There are 12 days off per year, a 13th-month salary, yearly Kick-off & Team-building events with various bonding activities at the workplace.

– Amazing culture – Our working environment is young and dynamic with many promotion opportunities, creating a sustainable career path.

– Opportunity to work with the best – We hire talented and collaborative ones.

– Get maximum support to master operations knowledge with additional leadership skills to meet the job’s requirements.

– Be empowered, self-determined, and have enough space for self-development in a typical E-logistics environment.

IV. OTHER INFORMATION

– Time of work: 9:00 am – 6:30 pm. From Monday to Friday and alternate Saturdays.

– Address: GHTK Building, Pham Hung Street, Me Tri Ward, Nam Tu Liem District, Ha Noi.

V. HOW TO APPLY

– To apply for the Data Analyst position, please send us your CV to email: talent.acquisition@ghtk.co.

– Subject: DA – Your Name.

title: [HN] DATA ANALYST

description:
OPSWAT, a global leader in IT, OT, and ICS critical infrastructure cybersecurity, delivers an end-to-end platform that gives public and private sector organizations and enterprises the critical advantage needed to protect their complex networks, secure their devices, and ensure compliance. Over the last 20 years our commitment to innovative technology has earned the trust of more than 1,700 organizations, governments, and institutions globally, solidifying our role in protecting the world’s critical infrastructure and securing our way of life.

The Position

OPSWAT is looking for a member who can roll up their sleeves to support the Revenue Operations organization. The individual should be agile and able to work directly with our leaders of sales & commercial operations.

This role requires someone who is detail oriented and comfortable in Salesforce, MS Excel. The role is based in Vietnam, reporting to our APAC leader of Sales Ops & Analytics. The role will work with teams across the globe including San Francisco, Tampa, London, & Israel on their Business Intelligence

We are growing rapidly, and it is a very exciting time to be in the cybersecurity industry.

What You Will Be Doing


 * Day-to-day administration and operational sales support to the Sales Team
 * Database management and maintenance: Own and maintain sales data and reports clean up in SFDC system
 * Help ensure data accuracy and integrity through regular audits and quality checks
 * Support Sales team with order preparation and generations
 * Support the implementation of data management best practices and process improvements.
 * Accounts/Contacts enrichment with data from 3rd party firmographic sources (Zoominfo, 6Sense, etc.)
   
   
   

What We Need From You


 * Highly organized, proactive and responsible self-starter
 * Ability to multi-task
 * Able to work under pressure and within tight timeframes
 * Strong initiative and can demonstrate a desire to improve all areas of operation
 * Excellent written skills
 * Experience of working in a busy sales office desirable
 * Good communicator - able to manage challenging salespeople
 * Take responsibility for own actions and development
 * Willingness to take on additional tasks as and when required
 * Demonstrate positive attitude at all times
   
   
   

OPSWAT is an equal opportunity employer. We celebrate diversity and are committed to providing an environment where equal employment opportunities are extended to all employees and applicants, free of discrimination and harassment of any type. All employment decisions are based on individual qualifications, job requirements, and business needs without regard to race, color, religion, age, sex, national origin, disability status, genetics, protected veteran status, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, or any other category protected by federal, state, or local laws.

Recruiting Agencies: we do not accept unsolicited resumes from third party agencies for any of our open positions. To submit resumes for our jobs, there must be a recruiting contract approved by our legal team and endorsed by both parties. We are currently not accepting additional 3rd party agencies at this time.

description:
FOUNDED IN 1926, PUBLICIS GROUPE IS NOW THE 2ND LARGEST COMMUNICATIONS GROUP IN THE WORLD. THROUGH A POWERFUL ALCHEMY OF CREATIVITY AND TECHNOLOGY, WE ARE DRIVING BUSINESS TRANSFORMATION ACROSS THE ENTIRE VALUE CHAIN.





Job Description



Join Digitas as a Data Analytics Manager, where you'll collaborate with brilliant minds to pioneer marketing solutions and transform ambitious businesses.



We're seeking a talented individual with a passion for data and technology, who can analyze large datasets from multiple sources, drive insights, and contribute to the bigger picture of marketing and business.



If you're ready to be part of a dynamic team and make a difference in marketing analytics, apply now!



Responsibilities:



As an Data Analytics Manager you will ensure robust analytical frameworks and methodologies are applied for our Clients.



Together with your Team of Executives and other stakeholders in Vietnam and SEA, you will gather, organize / structure, and validate large data sets from various activities, sources and markets. Then, using data mining, science and visualization techniques you will analyze data sets to find insights that will help inform plans and improve performance.



Detailed responsibilities include:



 * Gain deep knowledge of the Client's business, data, and marketing technology stack
 * Analyze large marketing datasets in a variety of databases and systems, to uncover insights and trends for informed decision-making
 * Collaborate with cross-functional Teams to collect data requirements, identify data-driven solutions and optimization opportunities
 * Design, develop, and maintain performance dashboards, reports, and visualizations for effective communication of insights to various internal and external stakeholders
 * Optimize data storage, connectivity, and retrieval processes and relevant technology solutions
 * Implement data quality and integrity measures including database schema and data pipeline to ensure accurate, integrated and valid / reliable analytics outputs
 * Conduct quality checks on collected data to identify and resolve any inconsistencies or discrepancies, track and resolve issues
 * Identify process improvement and automation opportunities to enhance data analytics operations and outcomes
 * Lead the kick-off meeting to explain the data collection process, timeline, requirements, and the weekly check-ins to track each market's progress and perform quality checks
 * Develop and maintain relevant processes and documentations
 * Ensure adherence to established guidelines, compliance with data privacy and security regulations
   
   

Qualifications


 * 3 years of experience in data analytics, preferably in relevant media and communications, marketing environments.
 * Understanding of media planning and media / CRM activation principles as well as familiarity with data/reports from martech platforms like Salesforce, CM360, DV360, Facebook, Google Ads, LinkedIn, TikTok, Twitter, etc.
 * Strong analytical skills with expertise in data manipulation, statistical analysis, and large-scale data visualization
 * Knowledge of data warehousing technologies, including data modeling, schema design, and ETL processes
 * Solid understanding of media and communications, related performance metrics, and attribution models
 * Proven end to end experience in managing analytical projects and Team independently, effectively and efficiently
 * Strong problem-solving abilities and strategic thinking for data-driven decision-making, attention to details
 * Excellent communication skills to convey complex data insights to technical and non-technical stakeholders (fluent in Vietnamese and proficient in English)
 * Familiarity with data security and privacy practices, including access controls, encryption, and anonymization
 * Passion for discovering untapped opportunities for clients and contributing to the team's success
   
   

Additional Information


 * Potential challenges and chances
 * Work in a professional, active, international and dynamic environment.
 * Open to travel oversea for training in Singapore

description:
SETA INTERNATIONAL VIETNAM - RECRUITMENT

Job Title: Data Scientist

Job Type: Full-Time




Job Description:

We are seeking a Data Scientist with a keen interest in data science, and optimization algorithms. This role is ideal for individuals with a foundational Python background, aiming to delve deeper into data science, and algorithmic problem solving.




Key Responsibilities:

 * Collaborate with teams to conceptualize and implement new features.
 * Engage in data science projects, utilizing Python data science frameworks like Pandas, NumPy, or SciPy, Scikit-learn, Keras
 * Develop and apply optimization algorithms to enhance software performance and data processing.
 * Contribute to the design of scalable, efficient software systems.
 * Write clean, maintainable code and perform unit testing.
 * Implement robust security measures and data protection protocols.
 * Keep abreast of new trends and best practices in Python development, Django, data science, and optimization techniques.




Required Qualifications:

 * At least 2 years of experience.
 * Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or related field.
 * Fluent in written and oral English
 * Solid grasp of Python programming.
 * Basic knowledge of the Django framework is a bonus point
 * Understanding of ORM libraries.
 * Capability to integrate diverse data sources and databases.
 * Knowledge of Python’s threading limitations and multi-process architecture.
 * Familiarity with event-driven programming in Python.
 * Familiarity with code versioning tools like Git.




Preferred Qualifications:




 * Experience with Python data science frameworks (Pandas, NumPy, SciPy, Scikit-learn, Keras).
 * Understanding of optimization algorithms and their application in software development.
 * Prior internship or project experience in Python, particularly in data-heavy environments.

Benefits:

 * Salary: up to 40M 
 * Attractive salary and bonus based on performance.
 * Full benefits for employees according to the Vietnam Labor Laws: social and health insurance
 * An international, professional, young but innovative, knowledge-shared environment works closely with international experts. Have the opportunity to join conferences and workshops on exciting new technologies.
 * Holidays based on Vietnamese labor law + paid vacations
 * Opportunity to be onsite in the US
 * Company trip, Team Building

description:
Do you have a passion for transforming raw data into actionable insights? If so, we want to hear from you! The Business Intelligence Team at Sieu Viet Group is searching for a sharp and experienced Senior Business Intelligence Specialist to join our growing team. In this role, you will play a pivotal role in uncovering hidden patterns and trends within our data, translating them into actionable insights that inform business decisions across the organization.




What you’ll be responsible for

 * Partner with stakeholders across various departments (Product, Marketing, Sales, Engineer) to understand their data needs and translate them into a clear and concise analysis plan.
 * Using SQL, Python, and other relevant tools to extract, clean, transform, and visualize data and develop and maintain data pipelines to ensure the smooth flow of data for analysis.
 * Participate as a contributing member in the entire product development process and marketing campaign lifecycle, from identifying problems/opportunities to brainstorming solutions, implementing strategies, and reporting outcomes.
 * Collaborates to create compelling reports (e.g., dashboards, analysis) that effectively communicate insights to both technical and non-technical audiences.
 * Provides education and support to end-users to ensure they understand how to use BI’s dashboards and properly interpret the BI's reports.

Requirements:

 * Bachelor's degree, preferably in a quantitative or data-oriented field.
 * Minimum of 4 years of experience in a Data Analyst, Business Analyst, or similar role.
 * Demonstrated strong analytical skills with the ability to identify patterns in large datasets.
 * Proficiency in SQL, with experience in data manipulation and automation tools.
 * Experience with data visualization tools (e.g., Looker Studio, MixPanel).
 * Excellent communication skills, both written and verbal, with the ability to present complex data findings to audiences with varying technical backgrounds.
 * Strong teamwork and collaboration skills, with the ability to prioritize tasks, manage time effectively, and meet deadlines under pressure.
 * Experience in a specific industry relevant to Vieclam24h is a plus.




What we’ll offer:

 * Attractive salary package, extra allowances, free lunch, free parking or Shuttle Bus, with 100% salary in probation offered.
 * Social Insurance: Fully compliant, starting from probation.
 * Premium Healthcare Insurance: Applicable for all official employees after probation.
 * Premium Annual Health Checks for employees (once per year).
 * OKR-base management: with clear SOWs, no fingerprint, or any physical attendance checking system.
 * Compelling Extras: 15 leaves/year, 4 flexible working days, birthday off, rewards & bonuses based on performance, company trips, and gifts/bonuses on special occasions & holidays.
 * “Bonding Policy” every month – for team engagement.




The Interview Process:

 1. Round 1 (Technical Expertise): Interview with BI Leader
 2. Round 2 (Culture): Interview with Head of Product.
