title: Data Scientist

description:
We are a fast-growing eCommerce Conversion Rate Optimization (CRO) agency dedicated to helping online businesses achieve optimal performance and growth. We specialize in data-driven insights to improve our clients’ user experiences, streamline their digital strategies, and drive conversion rates. Our team is passionate about transforming data into actionable insights to create outstanding eCommerce experiences.

We are seeking a detail-oriented and data-driven Web Analyst with a strong background in eCommerce and CRO. The ideal candidate will have hands-on experience in web analytics and interpreting data to uncover actionable insights. This role is crucial for informing strategic decisions across our clients' websites, aiming to enhance user experience, optimize conversion rates, and drive revenue growth.




Key Responsibilities:

 * Analytics Management: Set up, monitor, and analyze website performance and user behavior using tools like Google Analytics, Google Tag Manager, Looker Studio, Google/Bing search console, user tracking tools such as heat mapping or session recording tools.
 * Data Analysis: Conduct in-depth analyses on website traffic, conversion funnels, and key performance metrics. Identify opportunities to improve conversion rates, engagement, and retention.
 * Reporting & Insights: Develop regular reports and dashboards to track and communicate site performance and testing outcomes. Provide clear, actionable insights for internal teams and clients.
 * Cross-functional Collaboration: Work closely with UX/UI designers, developers, and project managers to inform UX/UI design and content decisions based on data-driven insights.
 * CRO Testing: Collaborate with CRO specialists to design and implement A/B tests, multivariate tests, and user experience tests. Track test results and make recommendations based on findings.
 * Cross Functional Team Communication: Present findings and recommendations to internal teams, explaining complex data in a clear, compelling way that highlights potential business impacts.




Your Skills and Experience

 * Degree in Marketing, Data Science, Business Analytics, or a related field.
 * 3+yearsofexperience in web analytics, eCommerce, and/or CRO.
 * Proficiency in Google Analytics, Google Tag Manager, and other analytics tools (experience with tools like Adobe Analytics, Hotjar, or Optimizely is a plus).
 * Strong analytical skills, with the ability to interpret complex data sets and translate them into actionable strategies.
 * Experience with A/B testing and multivariate testing methodologies is a plus.
 * Knowledge of UX principles and best practices in eCommerce is a plus.
 * Excellent communication skills, with the ability to explain data insights in a way that is accessible and engaging.
 * Detail-oriented, organized, and able to manage multiple projects simultaneously.




Why You'll Love Working Here

 * High, competitive base salary
 * Opportunity to work with leading eCommerce brands
 * Collaborative, data-driven, and supportive work environment
 * Professional growth and continuous learning opportunities
 * 13th month salary
 * Monday-Friday work week (9AM-6PM)
 * Monthly team building events
 * Annual company retreat
 * Personal Healthcare Insurance
 * Annual Healthcare Checkup
 * 15 days leave per year
 * Christmas Holiday
 * Daily tea, snack, and fruit breaks




If you’re passionate about using data to drive digital performance and want to make a real impact in the eCommerce industry, we’d love to hear from you!

For more information about us, please visit our website at www.forixcommerce.com

If you are interested in, do not hesitate to apply your CV at hr@forixdigital.com

If you need more information, please add my Telegram: @vyvo_forix
title: Web Analyst

description:
TechX is a trailblazer in cloud computing and data analytics, dedicated to empowering businesses in the banking, financial services, and enterprise sectors. Our flagship product, XData, revolutionizes data analytics by delivering advanced insights and innovative solutions that drive impactful outcomes.

Role Overview:

We are seeking an AI/ML Engineer with expertise in Generative AI to lead the fine-tuning of models and prompt design for domain-specific use cases. The ideal candidate will work on building scalable, intelligent solutions, ensuring the effective integration of generative AI models with backend systems. This role is central to developing, deploying, and maintaining AI-powered chatbots and solutions tailored for real-world applications.

Key Responsibilities:


 * Model Development and Fine-Tuning
 * Fine-tune pre-trained generative AI models (e.g., GPT, Claude) using domain-specific datasets.
 * Design and implement parameter-efficient tuning techniques (e.g., LoRA, adapters).
 * Evaluate and improve model performance using benchmarks and success criteria.
 * Prompt Engineering
 * Craft and optimize effective prompts for various AI tasks, such as text summarization, classification, and Q&A.
 * Design dynamic and context-aware prompt templates for retrieval-augmented generation workflows.
 * Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG)
 * Integrate generative AI models with vector databases (e.g., Pinecone, Elasticsearch) for retrieval-augmented workflows.
 * Optimize retrieval and ranking algorithms to ensure accurate responses.
 * Data Handling and Preprocessing
 * Preprocess and structure data from diverse formats, including Word documents, Excel spreadsheets, and scanned PDFs.
 * Implement OCR (Optical Character Recognition) pipelines for extracting information from scanned documents.
 * Backend and API Integration
 * Deploy AI models via RESTful APIs, ensuring seamless integration with backend systems.
 * Collaborate with backend developers to ensure end-to-end functionality and scalability.
 * Performance Monitoring and Optimization
 * Track model performance (accuracy, latency, error rates) and implement strategies to improve.
 * Monitor AI systems in production to detect and resolve issues proactively.
 * Collaboration and Documentation
 * Work closely with Business Analysts, QA Engineers, and other stakeholders to align AI solutions with business goals.
 * Document all workflows, including datasets, prompts, and fine-tuning configurations.
   
   

Key Required Skills And Qualifications


 * Technical Skills
 * Machine Learning and NLP:
    * Strong understanding of machine learning concepts and NLP techniques.
    * Experience with transformer-based models (e.g., GPT, BERT, Claude).

 * Deep Learning Frameworks:
    * Proficiency in TensorFlow, PyTorch, or Hugging Face Transformers.

 * Generative AI:
    * Hands-on experience fine-tuning generative models and crafting prompts.

 * Data Handling:
    * Expertise in preprocessing text and document formats using Pandas, NumPy, and Tesseract OCR.

 * API Development:
    * Experience deploying AI models via APIs using FastAPI, Flask, or similar frameworks.

 * RAG and Databases:
    * Knowledge of vector databases (e.g., Pinecone, Weaviate) and RAG workflows.

 * Programming and Cloud Skills
 * Proficiency in Python for AI/ML development.
 * Experience with cloud platforms (e.g., AWS, GCP, Azure), especially:
    * Amazon Bedrock, SageMaker, and Lambda for AI/ML workloads.
    * S3 for data storage and retrieval.

 * Analytical and Problem-Solving Skills
 * Strong analytical skills to interpret model outputs and identify optimization opportunities.
 * Ability to design experiments and validate results for performance improvement.
   
   

Preferred Qualifications


 * Familiarity with compliance standards (e.g., GDPR, HIPAA) for AI solutions.
 * Experience with monitoring and logging tools (e.g., CloudWatch, Kibana, MLflow).
 * Knowledge of CI/CD pipelines and containerization (e.g., Docker, Kubernetes).
 * Previous experience working on chatbots or conversational AI.
   
   

What We Offer


 * Competitive salary and benefits.
 * Opportunities to work on cutting-edge AI/ML technologies.
 * Collaborative and innovative work environment.
 * Continuous learning opportunities through workshops and training.
   
   

Join Our Team

If you are ready to make an impact and drive meaningful outcomes, we invite you to join us on this exciting journey.
title: AI/ML Engineer - Generative AI

description:
Our client is a pioneering AI data company that has been advancing the development of AI applications for nearly a decade. They specialize in enabling large-scale, high-quality data solutions that support cutting-edge fields like generative AI, autonomous systems and are focused on expanding their AI capabilities to support a wide range of evaluations for public and private sector clients.

The Role

Our client is seeking skilled engineers to join their team in a contract role, with flexible options for part-time (minimum 20 hours per week) or full-time engagement. The role involves collecting, curating, and annotating AI data and code to train and evaluate AI models. In this role, you will review prompts and refine code as needed to ensure accurate, high-quality outputs. Your expertise will play a crucial part in enhancing response accuracy and improving overall system performance. This is a fantastic opportunity to work within a collaborative, dynamic environment and contribute to innovative projects.

Ideal Profile

Qualifications

This role focuses on practical tech skills, emphasizing problem-solving and adaptability in delivering high-quality AI solutions. Our client is seeking skilled engineers with the following qualifications:


 * Software Engineering Experience: A degree in Computer Science or a related field, with proficiency in programming languages like Java, C, C++, Python, Go, SQL, Node React, TypeScript, and/or MongoDB.
 * Team Player: Experience in working with or managing teams in dynamic, fast-paced environments.
 * Problem Solving & Communication: Strong English communication skills and an action-oriented mindset to tackle challenges effectively.
 * Self-Motivated & Goal-Oriented: You can work independently, are goal-driven, and thrive in a fully remote team environment.
 * Compensation: USD 20- USD 25 per hour, depending on your skill set.
   
   

Shortlisted candidates will be invited to participate in a one-hour coding challenge, followed by a final interview for successful applicants. This contract role offers flexible working hours, with options for part-time (minimum 20 hours per week) or full-time engagement.

What's on Offer?


 * Flexible working options ( min 20 hours a week part-time or full time role)
 * Fully remote role
 * Work within a pioneering, fast growing AI data company
title: Remote AI Training Engineer (Flexi-time: min 20 hrs/ week)

description:
At Deloitte, we offer a unique and exceptional career experience to inspire and empower talents like you to make an impact that matters for our clientsDate: 2 Dec 2024

Service Line / Portfolios: Enterprise Technology & Performance

Location:

Bangkok, TH Ho Chi Minh City, Ho Chi Minh City, VN Hanoi, Hanoi, VN

Are you ready to unleash your potential?

At Deloitte, our purpose is to make an impact that matters for our clients, our people, and the communities we serve.

We believe we have a responsibility to be a force for good, and WorldImpact is our portfolio of initiatives focused on making a tangible impact on society’s biggest challenges and creating a better future. We strive to advise clients on how to deliver purpose-led growth and embed more equitable, inclusive as well as sustainable business practices.

Hence, we seek talented individuals driven to excel and innovate, working together to achieve our shared goals.

We are committed to creating positive work experiences that foster a culture of respect and inclusion, where diverse perspectives are celebrated, and everyone is recognised for their contributions.

Ready to unleash your potential with us? Join the winning team now!

Work you will do

You will be part of our structured Deloitte SEA Graduate Analyst Program and be given a personal coach, the opportunity to undergo a 2-week intensive bootcamp training aimed at equipping you with the skillsets necessary to excel, and opportunities to gain regional exposure by travelling across SEA as part of project assignments, and other professional development opportunities.

This program will allow you to develop core consulting skills and business acumen whilst gaining access to a wide scope of training and development activities. In addition, you will have an opportunity to work with like-minded people and gain exposure to a variety of projects within the chosen business area. You will be at the center of it all, performing research, data analysis and modelling to tackle complex business problems. In addition, you will contribute directly to the development of proposals, presentations, and publications.

This role sits within the Oracle team of Deloitte Southeast Asia, which encompasses the Oracle Module solutions respectively. As an Analyst, you will focus on functional design work while getting on-the-job training to assist the team in the growth of our Oracle business in the region. You will also be assisting the creation, sale, and delivery of Oracle solutions: Functional Design, Application & Systems Development, Business Transformation, etc.


 * Analysts may need to be involved in cross-functional project implementation teams
 * Work with the Project Manager to provide timely and accurate project status information to our client’s PMO team
 * Work closely with different stakeholders to gather requirements for reports, interfaces, integrations, and conversions
 * Work alongside the Project Team to deliver solutions for clients
 * Acquire new skills as professional training will be provided (e.g. Oracle Certification) to position you as a skilled technologist
 * On-the-job learning will help you get up to speed
   
   

Your role as a leader

At Deloitte, we believe in the importance of empowering our people to be leaders at all levels. We connect our purpose and shared values to identify issues as well as to make an impact that matters to our clients, people and the communities. Additionally, Analyst across our Firm are expected to:


 * Demonstrate a strong commitment to personal learning and development.
 * Understand how our daily work contributes to the priorities of the team and business.
 * Understand the set expectations and demonstrate accountability in keeping personal performance on track.
 * Actively focus on developing effective communications and relationship-building skills with stakeholders, clients and team.
 * Demonstrate an appreciation for working with others.
 * Understand what is fundamental to Deloitte’s success as a business.
 * Demonstrate integrity and an awareness of strengths, differences, and personal impact.
 * Develop their understanding of Deloitte and offer a fresh perspective.
   
   

What We Are Looking For


 * Available to commence work on 10 Feb 2025.
 * Fresh graduates with less than 2 years of working experience
 * No Oracle experience is required as professional certification training is provided!
 * Strong academic degree/master in Data Science, Data Analytics, Information Technology, Computer Science or related disciplines
 * Demonstrates good knowledge of (skills) will be an advantage.
 * Outstanding problem-solving skills, including the ability to analyses complex issues, develop hypotheses, and recommend solutions.
 * Excellent written and verbal English communication skills
 * Team player, with excellent interpersonal and communication skills
   
   

Due to volume of applications, we regret that only shortlisted candidates will be notified.

Please note that Deloitte will never reach out to you directly via messaging platforms to offer you employment opportunities or request for money or your personal information. Kindly apply for roles that you are interested in via this official Deloitte website.

This role is open to individuals who possess a valid permit or authorization to work in the respective countries they are applying for.

Requisition ID: 105875

In Thailand, the services are provided by Deloitte Touche Tohmatsu Jaiyos Co., Ltd. and other related entities in Thailand ("Deloitte in Thailand"), which are affiliates of Deloitte Southeast Asia Ltd. Deloitte Southeast Asia Ltd is a member firm of Deloitte Touche Tohmatsu Limited. Deloitte in Thailand, which is within the Deloitte Network, is the entity that is providing this Website.

title: AI Developer

description:
As Blueclip, we started our journey to bring the most creative minds and the know-how together to deliver great works.




About Our Search

We are currently looking for an AI Prompt Engineer for Content Creation to join our client, a global leader in AI-driven cryptocurrency analytics. This role offers the opportunity to combine creativity and technical expertise to revolutionize content production in the cryptocurrency space.




What are we looking for?

• Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, AI, Journalism, or a related field.

• 3+ years of experience in content creation, prompt engineering, or related roles.

• Extensive experience with ChatGPT, Claude, Midjourney, and Runway ML.

• Expert-level proficiency with Zapier for workflow automation.

• Strong writing and editing skills with meticulous attention to detail.

• Excellent understanding of SEO principles and content optimization techniques.

• Proven track record of creating effective prompts for high-quality, engaging content.

• Creative mindset with an eye for visual design and data visualization.

• Familiarity with cryptocurrency markets and blockchain technology.




Preferred Qualifications:

• Experience in the fintech or cryptocurrency industry.

• Knowledge of content management systems and publishing platforms.

• Familiarity with data analysis and visualization tools.

• Understanding of AI ethics and responsible AI use in content creation.

• Experience with A/B testing and content performance analysis.




What will you do?

This role is at the forefront of integrating AI into content creation, allowing you to innovate and impact the crypto market analysis and education landscape.

• Design and implement effective prompts for AI models to generate accurate, engaging crypto-related content.

• Create diverse content types, including articles, market analyses, educational materials, and visual assets.

• Use Zapier to automate workflows and integrate AI-generated content into the platform.

• Continuously refine and optimize prompts based on performance metrics and user engagement.

• Develop creative solutions for visual content generation using tools like Midjourney and Runway ML.

• Ensure all AI-generated content aligns with the brand voice, quality standards, and SEO best practices.

• Collaborate with the marketing and product teams to align content strategy with business goals.




Why join this team?

Join a mission-driven team at the cutting edge of AI and cryptocurrency. With a remote-first work environment, competitive salary, and equity package, this role offers the opportunity to innovate and make a lasting impact on crypto education and analytics.




Ready to lead the next wave of AI-driven content? Apply now!
title: AI Prompt Engineer

description:
Job Purpose

- The job holder proposes, initiates, and manages multiple ML projects together with the business in order to address problems raised before linked to company OKRs and product enhancements using DS methods, processes, and systems on unstructured, diverse Big Data sources.

- The job holder also participates in strategic decision circles and contributes to guiding business data at a high level and providing strategic data guidance

- The job holder is required to allocate resources, decide strategically on projects, and then cascade down to leads




Key Accountabilities (1)

Data Solutions

- Evaluate the effectiveness of proposed models and track business performance KPIs against the data model.

- Build cutting-edge algorithms and work with machine learning and deep learning tools to deliver advanced analytics solutions across the firm including recommendation engines, customized data models, etc.

- Drive application of machine learning and big data techniques across different journeys and squads.

- Manage, execute, and review complex data science projects in an agile manner and in compliance with internal regulatory requirements.




Key Accountabilities (2)

Data Insights

- Lead the identification and interpretation of meaningful and actionable insights from large data and metadata sources together with business partners.

- Review processes and tools designed to monitor and analyze model performance and prediction accuracy.

- Proactively lead discussions in 3+ squads to identify questions and issues for data science

- Collaborate with Data Engineers to build complex, technical algorithms in data analytics software applications to improve work efficiency.

- Know at all times your data (size, average, distributions, outliers, CR, etc) and be able to estimate model output, and impact, and come up with sanity checks to detect bugs (discrepancies between expectations and results)




Key Accountabilities (3)

Project Management

- Own the project, manage POs, keep everyone on track from distractions, aligned towards lowest hanging fruit and KPI

- Manage project conflicts, challenges, and dynamic business requirements to keep operations running at high performance.

- Work with team leads to resolve people problems and project roadblocks, conduct post-mortem and root cause analysis to help squads continuously improve their practices to ensure maximum productivity.

Talent Development

- Manage allocated team, focus on retention and growth of the scientists, personal development, and KPI

- Mentor and coach junior fellows into fully competent Data Scientists.

Identify and encourage areas for growth and improvement within the team




Key Relationships - Direct Manager

Director, Data Science




Success Profile - Qualification and Experiences

Qualifications

- Master’s degree (or higher) in Statistics, Mathematics, Quantitative Analysis, Computer Science, Software Engineering, Information Technology or other Numerical Disciplines




Work Experience

- 3+ years of relevant experience in areas of data analysis, machine learning, deep learning model

development of large amounts of data, implementing and deploying various statistical models

- English proficiency requirements are according to Techcombank's policy

- Deep experience in querying databases and coding (e.g. Python, R, Spark, Scala, SQL, Java, C, C++)

- Extensive experience in building data and analytics solutions and products, data mining and statistical analysis

- Experience in the application of machine learning and AI to questions related to the financial markets

- Working location: Hanoi/HCM




Why Techcombank?

 * Investing over 300 million USD to develop large-scale IT projects, Techcombank is one of the leading bank in Technology trends in Vietnam
 * You will grow with Techcombank by having the opportunity to learn from top experts from across the world
 * Techcombank provides a rewarding remuneration structure that commensurate with your achievement and contribution
 * Techcombank is the Top 2 Best place to work in the banking industry where you can experience various exciting activities throughout the year: Company anniversary, Team building, Active Saturday Off, Year End Party, etc.

title: (HN/HCM) Data Scientist/Senior Data Scientist

description:
Are you passionate about harnessing Generative AI to create innovative applications? We're seeking a Generative AI Engineer with expertise in prompting, data engineering, and model fine-tuning to bring advanced generative solutions to life. Join our team in a fully remote, full-time role focused exclusively on developing state-of-the-art generative AI capabilities.

Responsibilities

Design and refine prompts to optimize output quality for large language models (LLMs), image generation models, and other generative applications.

Work with data engineering teams to curate, preprocess, and manage large datasets tailored for generative model training.

Fine-tune generative AI models to meet specific project requirements, ensuring accuracy, relevance, and creativity in generated content.

Collaborate with product and engineering teams to deploy generative AI solutions in user-facing applications, ensuring seamless integration and performance.

Experiment with prompt engineering and data handling techniques to improve model response, coherence, and quality across diverse tasks.

Stay up-to-date with advancements in Generative AI, prompting strategies, and data engineering best practices, implementing cutting-edge approaches as they emerge.

Document experiments, prompting strategies, and model adjustments to share insights and best practices with the team.

Requirements

3+ years of experience working with Generative AI, including large language models, image synthesis, and prompt engineering.

Expertise in designing, testing, and optimizing prompts to achieve high-quality model outputs.

Strong background in data engineering for generative AI, including data curation, cleaning, and augmentation techniques.

Proficiency in Python and experience with generative AI libraries and frameworks like OpenAI, Hugging Face, or similar.

Familiarity with techniques for fine-tuning large generative models (e.g., GPT, DALL-E) for specific applications.

Understanding of MLOps practices for managing and deploying models in production.

Bachelor's or Master's degree in Computer Science, AI, Data Science, or a related field.

Preferred Qualifications

Experience with prompt engineering for various generative applications, including text, image, and audio.

Knowledge of ethical considerations in Generative AI and responsible AI practices.

Familiarity with cloud-based environments (AWS, GCP) for large-scale data handling and model deployment.

Experience with data versioning and tracking tools such as DVC or similar.

The Secret Ingredients That Make Us Special

Your growth is our growth. We invest in your future with paid training and other professional opportunities.

We're industry innovators at the forefront of change. Equipped with the latest technologies and a team of knowledgeable colleagues by your side, you'll embrace new and interesting challenges.

Your location. Your schedule — Pick your time zone, choose your preferred hours, and work from the place where you feel most at home.

Flexibility and freedom are in our DNA! As long as you have a stable internet connection and the drive to thrive, you can travel and work from anywhere you like.

A workload you can rely on. We'll set you enough tasks to keep that mind busy! At Scopic, we'll ensure you always have a consistent flow of engaging, challenging work to do.

Recognition and reward. We acknowledge diligence and hard work through annual pay increases for good performance.

Down to business!

Your starting rate is negotiable depending on your skills and experience.

This is an hourly paid position.

Contractors are paid monthly via wire transfer.

Our Values

Scopic is an equal-opportunity employer. We value diversity and do not discriminate on the basis of race, religion, color, marital status, national origin, gender, veteran status, sexual orientation, age, or disability status.

Have the skills, the drive, and the passion to join the Scopic family?

Apply today to join our growing team of remote professionals from around the world.

TERMS OF APPLICATION

By submitting an application;

I consent that the data provided in this form, and the attached CV, will be used for Scopic's recruiting purposes and email communications.

I consent to Scopic conducting an identity verification process as part of the hiring process. I understand that my personal information may be collected and processed for the purpose of verifying my identity in compliance with applicable laws.

Attention Job Seekers:Please be aware that scammers may be fraudulently using our company's name in hiring scams. To ensure your safety, all legitimate communication regarding job opportunities from our company will only come from email addresses ending withscopicsoftware.com. Please exercise caution and report any suspicious activity to our official channels.

Employment Type: Full-Time
title: Remote Generative AI Engineer

description:
Welfare


 * Attractive remuneration with competitive income and 6 months/year salaries/ efficient production and business.
 * A welfare package of $2000 per year including Tet bonus, holiday bonus and resort.
 * Being a colleague of a team of leading technology experts in fields such as: DPI, BigData, Machine Learning, AI, Data Mining, Speech Recognition, Virtual Assistant…
 * Improve capacity through intensive training courses, study support and professional certification exams.
 * Consider raising the minimum salary once a year. Access to attractive promotion opportunities.
 * 12 days holiday, 12 vacation days and 3 annual vacation days.
 * Always enjoy to the fullest full benefits of social insurance, health insurance, unemployment insurance and statutory leave and sick leave after signing the labor contract
 * Join the comprehensive health care MIC insurance package.
 * Relax, spark creativity with Happy Time every day, modern workspace.
 * Enjoy a delicious lunch, selected by nutritionists.
 * Working in key projects of the Group with large system scale.
 * Experience the multiculturalism when working with Viettel's personnel in more than 10 countries.
   
   

Job Descriptions

Build, evaluate, fine tune ML models, statistics to solve project use cases according to requirements and existing solutions

Define and implement normalization methods, transform, synthesize, extract suitable data to build features for ML algorithms

Coordinate with Data Analyst to implement sample test/pilot based on model output

Build documents according to procedures, regulations and other documents to present solutions, methods of building and using model results.

Job requirements

Graduated from a regular university with good grade or higher majoring in Mathematics, Economics, Computer Science, Probability and Statistics or other quantitative disciplines

English equivalent to 650 TOEIC (No certificate required when hiring)

Knowledge of basic machine learning algorithms: decision trees, linear regression, ensemble (random forest, boosting tree), k-means, SVM...

Knowledge of popular deep learning algorithms: CNN, LSTM, RNN...

Knowledge of statistics, exploratory data analysis (EDA) )

Knowledge of programming, data structures & algorithms, graph theory

Knowledge of statistical probability, linear algebra, analysis

Skill in using one of the machine learning libraries ( scikit-learn, pyspark ML, TensorFlow, Keras)

Distributed data processing knowledge, big data processing (Hadoop, Spark) - optional

Skills to use using programming languages: R, Python

SQL skills.

ETL flow building skills

title: [HCM] Data Scientist

description:
Working Location: Me Linh Point Tower, 02 Ngo Duc Ke, District 1, Ho Chi Minh

MAIN PURPOSE OF ROLE

A Data Scientist is a proficient specialist who applies mathematical, problem-solving, and coding skills to manage big data, extracting valuable insights. They design tailor-made solutions from this data, aiding organizations in achieving their unique objectives and goals.

Data Scientist Responsibilities Include


 * Undertaking data collection, preprocessing and analysis
 * Building models to address business problems.
 * Presenting information using data visualization techniques
   
   

This role requires one to be highly analytical with a knack for analysis, math and statistics. Critical thinking and problem-solving skills are essential for interpreting data. We also want to see a passion for machine-learning and research.

Main Responsibilities

Undertaking data collection, preprocessing and analysis


 * Identify valuable data sources and automate collection processes
 * Undertake preprocessing of structured and unstructured data
 * Analyze large amounts of information to discover trends
   
   

Building models to address business problems


 * Build predictive models and machine-learning algorithms
 * Combine models through ensemble modeling
   
   

Presenting information using data visualization techniques


 * Present information using data visualization techniques
 * Propose solutions and strategies to business challenges
 * Collaborate with engineering and product development teams
   
   

Minimum Background/ Experience Required

Work Experience : Minimum 6 years


 * Proven experience as a Data Scientist or Data Analyst
 * Experience in data mining
 * Understanding of machine-learning and operations research
 * Knowledge of R, SQL and Python; familiarity with Scala, Java or C++ is an asset
 * Experience using business intelligence tools (e.g. Tableau) and data frameworks (e.g. Hadoop)
 * Analytical mind and business acumen
 * Strong math skills (e.g. statistics, algebra)
 * Problem-solving aptitude
 * Excellent communication and presentation skills
   
   

Education Level

BSc/BA in Computer Science, Engineering or relevant field; graduate degree in Data Science or other quantitative field is preferred

CORE Skills Required


 * Organization and planning skills
 * Analytical thinking
 * Reporting skills
 * Interpersonal skills
 * Problem solving skills.
 * Time management
 * Good command of English

title: Marketing Data Scientist - Nutrition Division

description:
WorldQuant develops and deploys systematic financial strategies across a broad range of asset classes and global markets. We seek to produce high-quality predictive signals (alphas) through our proprietary research platform to employ financial strategies focused on market inefficiencies. Our teams work collaboratively to drive the production of alphas and financial strategies – the foundation of a balanced, global investment platform.

WorldQuant is built on a culture that pairs academic sensibility with accountability for results. Employees are encouraged to think openly about problems, balancing intellectualism and practicality. Excellent ideas come from anyone, anywhere. Employees are encouraged to challenge conventional thinking and possess an attitude of continuous improvement.

Our goal is to hire the best and the brightest. We value intellectual horsepower first and foremost, and people who demonstrate an outstanding talent. There is no roadmap to future success, so we need people who can help us build it.

Technologists at WorldQuant research, design, code, test and deploy firmwide platforms and tooling while working collaboratively with researchers and portfolio managers. Our environment is relaxed yet intellectually driven. We seek people who think in code and are motivated by being around like-minded people.

The Role: WorldQuant is seeking an exceptional individual to join the firm as a Machine Learning Engineer. While prior finance experience is not required, a successful candidate must possess a strong interest in learning about finance and global markets. Machine Learning Engineers will design, code and implement complex proprietary pipelines, models and tools to drive our forecast business. You will collaborate with researchers and PM’s to gather, analyze and spec out requirements, develop/test code, and manage product deliverables. A successful candidate will help build the software that will be used by Portfolio Managers to construct portfolios.

What You’ll Bring


 * M.Sc./Ph.D. from a leading university in a Computer Science, Engineering, or related discipline
 * Experience designing and operating complex machine learning models and data pipelines
 * Experience building distributed or data intensive systems
 * Excellent problem solving abilities, insight, and judgment as well as a strong attention to detail
 * Experience programming production systems in Python or C++
 * Experience working in Linux environments
 * Strong communication skills; ability to express complex concepts in simple terms
 * Understanding of basic probability, statistical inference, software solvers, mathematical optimization is a big plus
 * Experience building CI/CD pipelines is a big plus
   
   

What We Offer


 * Competitive and attractive compensation package with clear career road-map – where you feel challenged everyday
 * We offer a strong culture of learning and development: training courses, library, speakers, share and learn events
 * Learn from who sits next to you! Working in WQ you are surrounded by smart and talented people
 * Employee resources groups with strong diversity and inclusion culture
 * Premium Health Insurance and Employee Assistance Program
 * Generous time-off policy, re-creation sabbatical leave (based on tenure), Trade Union benefits for staff and family
 * Team building activities every month: Local engagement events, monthly team lunch – Employee clubs: football, ping-pong, badminton, yoga, running, PS5, movies, etc.
 * Annual company trip and occasional global conferences – opportunity to travel and connect with our global teams
 * Happy-hour with tea break, snacks and meals every day in the office!
   
   

By submitting this application, you acknowledge and consent to terms of the WorldQuant Privacy Policy. The privacy policy offers an explanation of how and why your data will be collected, how it will be used and disclosed, how it will be retained and secured, and what legal rights are associated with that data (including the rights of access, correction, and deletion). The policy also describes legal and contractual limitations on these rights. The specific rights and obligations of individuals living and working in different areas may vary by jurisdiction.

Copyright © 2024 WorldQuant, LLC. All Rights Reserved.

WorldQuant is an equal opportunity employer and does not discriminate in hiring on the basis of race, color, creed, religion, sex, sexual orientation or preference, age, marital status, citizenship, national origin, disability, military status, genetic predisposition or carrier status, or any other protected characteristic as established by applicable law.

description:
Data Analytics Manager is responsible for the creation of new data analytic capabilities for the business by envisioning and executing strategies that will improve business performance by enabling informed decision making.

The position need to use data to develop solutions tailored to meet the organization’s unique needs.




Job Description:




-                 Create and enforce policies for effective data management.

-                 Formulate techniques for quality data collection to ensure adequacy, accuracy and legitimacy of data.

-                 Devise and implement efficient and secure procedures for data handling with attention for all technical aspects.

-                 Establish rules and procedures for data sharing with upper management, external stakeholders ect.

-                 Support others in daily use of data systems and ensure adherence to legal and company standards.

-                 Assist with reports and data extraction when needed.

-                 Monitor and analyze information and data systems and evaluate their performance to discover ways of enhancing them (new technologies, upgrades etc.).

-                 Ensure digital databases and archives are protected from security breaches and data losses.

-                 Troubleshoot data-related problems and authorize maintenance or modifications.

-                  Drive Data Operations to improve business efficiency using data

-                  Drive Data-driven insights from problem statements into key business action

Responsible for delivery of high quality projects on time and budget.



Job requirements:

-       Graduate / Post Graduate in Statistics / Economics / Engineering from premier college / university

-       8 years of experience including team management experience 3-5 years of managing data analyst/scientists.

-       Proficiency with data technology, data management including setting up policy for collecting, storing, processing and extracting data.

-       Ability to create analytical models to find out database insights.

-       Skills: Leadership · Coaching · Data-driven Decision Making · Data Analytics · Data Visualization · Databases
title: Data Analytics Manager

description:
YOU

You want to be an important member of a strong team of other makers who take pride in their work and support each other. As a Senior AI Engineer, you will be responsible for handling certain projects and working directly with our US stakeholders. That’s year one. If career growth is important to you, we not only know how to help you with that, it’s what we love to do: https://youtu.be/PUqzuWryYcU




PROJECT DESCRIPTION

Pipeline Takeoff (PTO) is a web-based application that allows you to plan and manage your projects within one cohesive platform. This includes the ability to upload digital blueprints, record measurements, and create fast and accurate estimates.

Document Intelligence is an Azure AI Service that supports PTO tool not only for auto-name sheets but also to validate scales on the house design. Additionally, AI OCR assists users in auto take-off key measures for repeated objects such as doors, lights, etc. Through the integration of AI in PTO, service takeoff challenges can astutely be resolved by leveraging the "potential features" that have been developing.

 * Auto-takeoff 1000+ objects (rooms, doors, windows, etc.) concurrently for seconds
 * Replace Blue Beam, Planswift, Autosketch.
 * Auto-scale recognition
 * Auto-detect room boundary & Auto-calculate Area/ Perimeter
 * Digitize job site plan into room areas.




WHAT YOU’LL BE DOING

At Simpson Strong-Tie we value the individual, and the creativity that individuals can bring to the workplace. You join this company for a career, not a job!

 * You will join the AI engineering team at the most innovative manufacturing and construction with US Team to build and develop AI services to help the product market improve its performance.
 * You enjoy working in a cross-functional environment, collaborating with product managers, software engineers, designers, data analytics, data engineers, and business stakeholders.
 * You will also be responsible for creating and optimizing core modules of the MLOps platform, from the computation layer to the orchestrator layer.
 * Working alongside our data scientists, you will enhance their workflows by providing efficient and effective solutions developed by the MLOps team.
 * Help coordinate schedules with SST Product Development, the Takeoff Tool Team and Vendor.
 * Follow up with Vendor closely to make sure alignment of between PTO and Auto-assist takeoff
 * Research, create and deploy AI/ML algorithm




DESIRED SKILLS AND EXPERIENCE

If you can do everything listed above, you’ve got what it takes. Perhaps some of the following would be helpful too:

 * Experience of at least 3 years in Software Development
 * Experience of at least 3 years in AI, Machine Learning, Data Science roles.
 * Strong technical hands-on experience in Python.
 * Design, develop and maintain scalable and resilient AI/ML products, e.g. Recommendations system & Personalization, Chatbot, Search, Forecasting, etc. You are responsible for end-to-end machine learning product life cycle.
 * Apply technical expertise with quantitative analysis, experimentation, data mining, and the presentation of data to develop strategies for our machine learning products.
 * Solid knowledge of Machine Learning fundamental i.e. knowledge of model’s variant and use cases, end-to-end ML lifecycle process, model development, model selection, hyperparameter optimization, feature engineering, evaluation.
 * Strong hands-on experience in Machine Learning algorithms & libraries like Tensorflow, Pytorch, Keras, Scikit, Pandas.
 * Monitoring the performance of the MLOps platform and proactively identifying areas for optimization. This includes analyzing system performance, ensuring low latency, and optimizing cloud resource consumption for cost-effective operations.
 * Design, implement, and optimize the core modules of our MLOps platform. This includes developing solutions that enhance our machine learning workflows’ scalability, efficiency, and robustness.
 * Proven track record of operating independently, stakeholder management, demonstrating creativity, and delivering results.
 * Hands-on experience with cloud providers such as Google Cloud Platform (GCP) or Amazon Web Services (AWS) or Microsoft Azure. Your familiarity with cloud services and infrastructure will be essential in architecting scalable and reliable MLOps solutions.
 * Practical experience of ML modeling, involving the entire process from conceptualizing ideas to developing, evaluating, and deploying models, with the added advantage of having expertise in monitoring and managing model performance after deployment.
 * Good verbal and written communication in English is required.




HERE IS WHAT WE OFFER

 * Attractive salary with 100% SHUI applied salary during probation
 * 13th month salary, Performance Bonus, Salary review annually
 * Opportunity to be on-site in the USA
 * Chance to collaborate and work with our global stakeholders
 * We provide employee training & development to enhance skill sets and competencies
 * Internal training: Udemy, Pluralsight, and other online training courses; TechTalk sharing within Software Development Division
 * External training: Leadership, English, Soft Skills, ….
 * Premium health care program for you + one of your beloved ones, Annual medical check-up
 * 14 vacation days + Christmas Day per year
 * Benefits for special holidays (Birthday, Marriage, Women’s Day, Tet Holidays, Mid-Autumn, New born babies, International Children ‘s Day…)
 * Social Activities, Sports Clubs and Team-building events such as Company trip, Year-End party,… are carried out on a regular basis
 * Young, friendly, quality and result oriented working environment under team-work spirit
 * Modern working conditions and entertainment facilities at office with snacks, tea and coffee all the time
 * Compliance fully to Vietnam Labor Code
title: Senior AI Engineer

location: Ho Chi Minh City, Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam
title: Data Engineer

description:
TechX is a trailblazer in cloud computing and data analytics, dedicated to empowering businesses in the banking, financial services, and enterprise sectors. Our flagship product, XData, revolutionizes data analytics by delivering advanced insights and innovative solutions that drive impactful outcomes.

Role Overview:

We are seeking a highly skilled AI/ML Engineer with expertise in Generative AI to lead the fine-tuning of models and prompt design for domain-specific use cases. The ideal candidate will work on building scalable, intelligent solutions, ensuring the effective integration of generative AI models with backend systems. This role is central to developing, deploying, and maintaining AI-powered chatbots and solutions tailored for real-world applications.

Key Responsibilities:


 * Model Development and Fine-Tuning
 * Fine-tune pre-trained generative AI models (e.g., GPT, Claude) using domain-specific datasets.
 * Design and implement parameter-efficient tuning techniques (e.g., LoRA, adapters).
 * Evaluate and improve model performance using benchmarks and success criteria.
 * Prompt Engineering
 * Craft and optimize effective prompts for various AI tasks, such as text summarization, classification, and Q&A.
 * Design dynamic and context-aware prompt templates for retrieval-augmented generation workflows.
 * Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG)
 * Integrate generative AI models with vector databases (e.g., Pinecone, Elasticsearch) for retrieval-augmented workflows.
 * Optimize retrieval and ranking algorithms to ensure accurate responses.
 * Data Handling and Preprocessing
 * Preprocess and structure data from diverse formats, including Word documents, Excel spreadsheets, and scanned PDFs.
 * Implement OCR (Optical Character Recognition) pipelines for extracting information from scanned documents.
 * Backend and API Integration
 * Deploy AI models via RESTful APIs, ensuring seamless integration with backend systems.
 * Collaborate with backend developers to ensure end-to-end functionality and scalability.
 * Performance Monitoring and Optimization
 * Track model performance (accuracy, latency, error rates) and implement strategies to improve.
 * Monitor AI systems in production to detect and resolve issues proactively.
 * Collaboration and Documentation
 * Work closely with Business Analysts, QA Engineers, and other stakeholders to align AI solutions with business goals.
 * Document all workflows, including datasets, prompts, and fine-tuning configurations.
   
   

Key Required Skills And Qualifications


 * Technical Skills
 * Machine Learning and NLP:
    * Strong understanding of machine learning concepts and NLP techniques.
    * Experience with transformer-based models (e.g., GPT, BERT, Claude).

 * Deep Learning Frameworks:
    * Proficiency in TensorFlow, PyTorch, or Hugging Face Transformers.

 * Generative AI:
    * Hands-on experience fine-tuning generative models and crafting prompts.

 * Data Handling:
    * Expertise in preprocessing text and document formats using Pandas, NumPy, and Tesseract OCR.

 * API Development:
    * Experience deploying AI models via APIs using FastAPI, Flask, or similar frameworks.

 * RAG and Databases:
    * Knowledge of vector databases (e.g., Pinecone, Weaviate) and RAG workflows.

 * Programming and Cloud Skills
 * Proficiency in Python for AI/ML development.
 * Experience with cloud platforms (e.g., AWS, GCP, Azure), especially:
    * Amazon Bedrock, SageMaker, and Lambda for AI/ML workloads.
    * S3 for data storage and retrieval.

 * Analytical and Problem-Solving Skills
 * Strong analytical skills to interpret model outputs and identify optimization opportunities.
 * Ability to design experiments and validate results for performance improvement.
   
   

Preferred Qualifications


 * Familiarity with compliance standards (e.g., GDPR, HIPAA) for AI solutions.
 * Experience with monitoring and logging tools (e.g., CloudWatch, Kibana, MLflow).
 * Knowledge of CI/CD pipelines and containerization (e.g., Docker, Kubernetes).
 * Previous experience working on chatbots or conversational AI.
   
   

What We Offer


 * Competitive salary and benefits.
 * Opportunities to work on cutting-edge AI/ML technologies.
 * Collaborative and innovative work environment.
 * Continuous learning opportunities through workshops and training.
   
   

Join Our Team

If you are ready to make an impact and drive meaningful outcomes, we invite you to join us on this exciting journey.
title: AI/ML Engineer (Generative AI - Fine-Tuning and Prompt Design) - Open Expats

description:
JOB DESCRIPTION 

The incumbent will be responsible for:  

 * Acting as a solution lead and guiding the project team members for the entire AWS Data Platform services setup.  
 * Developing and planning for the implementation among the team members for the delivery. 
 * Working alongside the Data Team to clarify requirements, set the scope, and deliver the services based on the stakeholders’ requirements.  
 * Ensuring that all projects are delivered on time and within scope. 
 * Reporting project status and tracking progress for the delivery. 
 * Creating and maintaining comprehensive project documentation 




REQUIREMENTS

To thrive and be successful in this role, you must have/be:  

 * Degree/Diploma in any Information Technology discipline 
 * Minimally 3 years of experience in data engineering on AWS Data Platform eg. AWS Glue, AWS Lake Formation, AWS Redshift, AWS Data Zone, AWS Data Catalog, etc. 
 * Experience in data lake, and data warehouse implementation. 
 * Experience in securities and derivatives broking business is an advantage. 
 * Possess a project management skillset (Applicable to Team Lead role only). 
 * Familiar with RDBMS, like SQL Server/Oracle is preferable. 
 * Knowledge of Power BI is an advantage. 
 * Proven ability in multiple disciplines of data warehousing such as data access, RDBMS, ETL, and data management




BENEFITS

 * Training and career development opportunities.
 * Package: 13, 14 salary months + Project bonus + KPI bonus.
 * Extra package: 16 Mil /employee/year (Bonus at Tet, New Year, your birthday, CMC Corp’s birthday, 2/9 and Tet’s gift, Middle-Autumn gift, …)
 * Salary review 2 times/year or on excellent performance.
 * Opportunity to approach the newest technology trends; and develop your career within an international Company. Building large-scale & global software products for our clients.
 * Onsite opportunities: short-term and long-term assignments in US, EU,
 * Paid annual leave: 12 days + gift for your birthday.
 * Company’s labor policy completely pursuant to Vietnamese labor legislation plus other benefits offered by the company (PTI care premium, Company trip, Holiday, Sum-up, etc.).
 * Exciting leisure: sports and art events (football club, family day, happy hour,).

description:
Job Description

As a member of the data and analytics team, the Business Intelligence Developer will work hand-in-hand with business stakeholders to assess needs and deliver data products that support and enhance decision-making. This individual will be well versed in data warehousing, data reporting, particularly with scripting languages such as SQL, and dashboard creation using visualization tools such as Power BI. This position will require a high degree of attention to detail along with ability to review calculations for quality assurance as well as solid communication and organization skills.

Roles, Responsibilities & Typical Activities


 * Ability to build Power BI Reports/Dashboards and reports by connecting to varied data sources
 * Estimate technical requirements and breaks down work to user stories and tasks
 * Design and work on proof of concepts that can be demonstrated to the customer
 * Perform Data Cleaning & Data Profiling
 * Optimize report performance
 * Prepare holistic documentations (process and technical) to enable proper knowledge transfer between both the data team as well as current/future users
 * Other reasonable duties as assigned
   
   

Your Skills And Experience

University or College degree, preferably major in Computer Science, Information Technology or related major

English level (CEFR) B2 or equivalent

Ability to consult in interfacing with business stakeholders to determine needs organize and prioritize tasks

Must be detail oriented and able to problem solve

Have a strong sense of urgency and commitment to quality customer service is required

Must be team and service oriented

Demonstrated internal customer service insights including the implementation of employee satisfaction charters.

Why You'll Love Working Here

Extremely competitive salary.

13th month & productivity Bonus.

Yearly salary review.

Healthcare insurance package.

24/24 Personal accident insurance.

State-of-the-art office environment.

Yearly outing.

English training programs.

5-day week.

Flexible start-times.

Free lunch.

Free parking.

Full Social Club including gym, yoga, football, badminton, swimming,...
title: Business Intelligence Developer (PowerBI)

description:
Our Company

We’re Hitachi Digital Services, a global digital solutions and transformation business. Our expertise, innovation and technology unlocks potential – we take theme park fans on magical rides, conserve natural resources, protect rainforests, and save lives. We automate, modernize, optimize, and accelerate. Our people are trusted transformers, with deep engineering expertise, focused on a sustainable future for all.

Imagine the sheer breadth of talent it takes to inspire the future. We don’t expect you to ‘fit’ every requirement – your life experience, character, perspective, and passion for achieving great things in the world are equally important to us.

Meet our Team

Hitachi Digital Services Vietnam is part of a 300 strong global delivery network, supporting Hitachi Digital Services around the globe. Our employees collaborate with teams in India, Portugal, and the US, servicing customers worldwide and working on a huge variety of projects. From cloud migration to digital modernization and advanced analytics, offering operational excellence, agile delivery, and plenty of energy to work on huge transformation projects for our customers.

The Role


 * Teamwork and handle day-to-day work efficiently and independently.
   
   

What You’ll Bring


 * Proficient Pyspark
 * Experience with cloud computing, one of Azure, AWS, GCP
 * Good at English communication
 * Big plus with other data technologies: Pentaho DI, Airflow, …
 * Good English
   
   

Nice To Have


 * Intermediate experience of ETL principles
 * Experience of relational database design principles
 * Ability to effectively coach other team members
 * Knowledge of agile development practices
 * Good knowledge of the principles and implementation of normalization
 * Understanding of "test first" approach
 * An understanding of XML and JSON structures
 * Experience of working with external APIs
 * Experience of source control in GIT
   
   

About Us

We’re a global, team of innovators. Together, we harness engineering excellence and passion to co-create meaningful solutions to complex challenges. We turn organizations into data-driven leaders that can make a positive impact on their industries and society. If you believe that innovation can bring a better tomorrow closer to today, this is the place for you.

Championing diversity, equity, and inclusion

Diversity, equity, and inclusion (DEI) are integral to our culture and identity. Diverse thinking, a commitment to allyship, and a culture of empowerment help us achieve powerful results. We want you to be you, with all the ideas, lived experience, and fresh perspective that brings. We support your uniqueness and encourage people from all backgrounds to apply and realize their full potential as part of our team.

How We Look After You

We help take care of your today and tomorrow with industry-leading benefits, support, and services that look after your holistic health and wellbeing. We’re also champions of life balance and offer flexible arrangements that work for you (role and location dependent). We’re always looking for new ways of working that bring out our best, which leads to unexpected ideas. So here, you’ll experience a sense of belonging, and discover autonomy, freedom, and ownership as you work alongside talented people you enjoy sharing knowledge with.

We’re proud to say we’re an equal opportunity employer and welcome all applicants for employment without attention to race, colour, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, veteran, age, disability status or any other protected characteristic. Should you need reasonable accommodations during the recruitment process, please let us know so that we can do our best to set you up for success.

description:
Data Analytics, & CRM Administrator is one of the key contributors to Commercial Excellence who is responsible for developing the holistic database, analytics and visualization across data points of business operations in both top-line and bottom-line standpoints. Furthermore, this position contributes to the drive of sales planning and customer management on regular basis in terms of framework, technological application and thereby excellence in execution in local business operations. He/she will also play a critical role to ensure all of the incentive scheme compliantly calculated and proceeded throughout approval workflow.

Position Responsibilities

Data Science, Analytics


 * Apply business insights and G2M understanding to continuously and resiliently innovate the company dashboard holistically across dimensions of the business as single source of performance management of business operational indicators including revenue, distribution, customer management, inventory level, and other FFE performance database.
   
   

Develop the framework for sales planning activities annually in terms of historical data and customer mapping across business lines in alignment with up-to-date strategic imperatives.


 * Drive the holistic data visibility of inventory management for all in-market SKUs across touchpoints from demand planning to warehouses at Zoetis, LSP, ZPC(s) and ultimately customers warehouses in strong collaboration with other stakeholders including Supply Chain, Logistics, and Business Lines.
 * Serve as coordinator with 3rd party for the management of Distribution Management System (DMS) where applied especially to ZPCs as well as generate the data analytics and visualization of distribution performance across channels and species.
 * Evaluate the sales performance for all relevant salesforce who is eligible for incentive on quaterly basis with transparency and complaince
 * Nurture the One Zoetis corporate value by integrating all teams in terms of standard framework and data-based business management as well as embracing and encouraging best practices which cultivate the enhanced standards and disciplines across business lines.
 * Serve as In-house Consultant for Data Science, Analytics and Visualization to drive discussion and alignment on related business improvement proposal in identifying the opportunities to enhance the database management on Dashboard across the go-to-market model for each and every business lines as well as drive alignment on solutions, processes and initiatives.
   
   

CRM Administration


 * Serve as point of administration of Customer Relationship Management (CRM) system on salesforce.com in collaboration with global/cluster experts. Serve as key contact point for ensuring customer database always up-to-date sufficiently in collaboration with Customer Service, Business Lines and Field Force Effectiveness
 * Serve as In-house Consultant for CRM platform utilization with strong collaboration with Cluster ZTD, FFE in enhancing the system from technical and business needs

description:
LARION, a global software outsourcing partner with 2 decades deep industry expertise. We are a 100% Vietnam technology company specializing in turnkey solutions and building highly skilled development teams for companies of all size and types of business. Run by a team of successful entrepreneurs and dedicated technical experts - LARION is a unique symphony where we create a frictionless future for customers with passion, while maintaining full compliance with your needs and objectives.




I. What You’ll Do

 * Participate in designing distributed system architecture for systems and services.
 * Participate in development and maintenance of backend services in Python.
 * Participate in development and maintenance of web user interfaces.
 * Coordinate with stake holders such as infrastructure team, business team, etc … to resolve issues.




II. What You’ll Bring

 * Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science or related discipline or equivalent job experience.
 * 3+ years of hands-on industry experience developing scalable and robust software applications in web environments with exposure to backend stacks.
 * Hands-on experience with Python.
 * Strong understanding of data structures, algorithms, Object Oriented Programming.
 * Working knowledge of Unix/Linux environment.
 * Having knowledge and experience with web front-end development is a big plus.
 * Experience with CI/CD, microservices, caching tools, data visualization, queuing systems, or large-scale distributed systems is a great plus.
 * Working experience or willingness to work with C++ is an advantage.
 * Excellent debugging and problem-solving skills.
 * Excellent interpersonal skills.
 * Good command of English (oral communication).




III. Why You’ll Love Working Here

1/. Working place:

 * Join a young and dynamic team with awesome projects applying the latest technology.
 * Working with specialists from all over the world provides you with a fantastic opportunity to expand your skill set.
 * Culture of openness and honesty in which individuals are respected and encouraged to achieve their full potential.




2/. Benefit comprise:

 * 13th-month salary and attractive performance bonuses.
 * Flexible hybrid working model between working at the office and working at home.
 * Premium Healthcare and Accident Insurance.
 * Annual health check package.
 * Free parking and allowances: Lunch, Marriage, Newborn baby, Bereavement and others applied.
 * A spacious pantry that is fully equipped with coffee maker, fridge, microwave and more for your most comfortable lunchtime.
 * A wide range of sports and social activities: Yoga, Football, Badminton, Tech clubs, etc.
 * Annual company trip and team building.
 * Chance to be honored quarterly and annually with recognition awards for individuals, teams, long-term service, etc.
 * Advanced English and appropriate soft skills training to assist your career development.
 * Engaging monthly events: Happy Gathering, Mini Game, Team Birthday Celebrations, Company’s Year-end party, etc.
 * Exclusive company supporting funds to ease your personal loans of Home, Vehicle, Tuition, etc.




Office Location: QTSC1 Building, Quang Trung Software City, District 12, Ho Chi Minh City.




Gentle notice to our candidate about Decree No.13/2023/N?-CP

"According to Decree No.13/2023/N?-CP on protecting personal data, LARION would apply ""Personal Data Processing Agreement"" with all candidates to ensure compliance with the decree.

By submitting this application to LARION, you agree to allow LARION to proceed your provided information in accordance with ""Personal Data Processing Agreement"" that you have read, fully understood and agreed to the entire content at link https://larion.com/privacy-policy/"

description:
Responsibilities

What you’ll do in this role:


 * Design, develop and maintain scalable and resilient AI/ML products, recommendations system and personalization, chatbot, search and forecasting. You are responsible for end-to-end machine learning product life cycle, i.e. EDA, experimentation, model development, productionization, evaluation, automation with CI/CD pipeline, and A/B testing.
 * Apply technical expertise with quantitative analysis, experimentation, data mining, and the presentation of data to develop strategies for our machine learning products that serve millions of Lumin users and businesses.
 * Work with large and complex data sets to solve challenging problems using analytical, statistical, and machine learning algorithms.
 * Identify and measure the success of machine learning product efforts through goal setting and monitoring of key metrics to understand trends.
 * Gain an understanding of potential opportunities and methods to enhance the solutions, and use your insights and recommendations to test and drive initiatives forward.
 * Develop and conduct best practices in the AI team.
 * Partner with product, engineering, analytics, business, and cross-functional teams to inform, influence, support, and execute AI initiatives.
 * Responsible for maintaining the health of the uptime SLA of the service.
 * Provide support in coaching and mentoring the more junior team members.
   
   

Your Skills And Experience

Good candidates for AI Engineer position should have the following qualifications:


 * A Bachelor or Master in a quantitative field (Computer Science, Engineering, etc).
 * Experience of 3-9 years in AI, Machine Learning, or Data Science roles.
 * Strong technical hands-on experience in Python.
 * Solid knowledge of Machine Learning fundamental i.e. knowledge of models variant and use cases, end-to-end ML lifecycle process, model development, model selection, hyperparameter optimization, feature engineering, evaluation, etc.
 * Extensive practical knowledge of Machine Learning algorithms libraries such as Tensorflow, Pytorch, Keras, Scikit-Learn and Pandas.
 * Hands-on experience in three or more of the following AI topics: NLP, recommendation systems, predictive analytics, computer vision, search.
 * Proficient experience in git and building CI/CD pipelines.
 * Experience in operating Docker images within a microservices architecture.
 * Proficiency in working with either GCP or AWS cloud platforms is required.
 * Experience in MLOps platform e.g. MLflow, or Kubeflow.
 * Having experience working with SQL is a plus.
 * Nice-to-have: practical experience working with GenAI/LLM.
 * Have a growth mindset, self-driven, high motivation & curiosity to learn.
 * Strong analytical skills and proven experience working with complex & large data.
 * Having a track record of delivering and taking action based on insights derived from JD – Senior AI Engineer 3 data is a plus.
 * Demonstrated ability to successfully deliver end-to-end ML projects, including identifying impactful use cases, estimating effort, conducting EDA, developing solutions and models, evaluating performance, deploying models, and monitoring their performance.
 * Proven track record of operating independently, stakeholder management, demonstrating creativity, and delivering results.
 * A self-driven individual and a team player with excellent communication skills.
   
   

Why should you join our team?


 * Flexible working hours with hybrid working model, have 2 remote days / week
 * Professional training process. (support udemy training course)
 * Performance review.
 * Almost all customers from the US, UK ….
 * Support IMac/Macbook
 * PVI Health Care
 * Refund leave days
 * 13th month salary and Bonus based on performance.
 * 12-day annual leave per year
 * Food & drink in the office ….
 * Company trips, team building, pingpong club, office party, ….

Company Description

FPT Software, a subsidiary of FPT Corporation, is a global technology and IT services provider headquartered in Vietnam. title: Data Engineer

description:
Buymed is seeking an experienced and strategic Senior Data Scientist to join our rapidly growing data team. As a Senior Data Scientist, you will take a leading role in shaping data-driven decision-making processes, building advanced machine learning models, and uncovering insights that drive growth and operational efficiency across Buymed’s platform. You will collaborate with cross-functional teams and work on high-impact projects involving customer behavior, pricing strategies, and operational optimization in the healthcare and pharmaceutical sectors.

Key Responsibilities:

 * Lead Advanced Analytics: Own the development of sophisticated data models and algorithms to solve complex business problems, including predictive analytics, demand forecasting, and customer segmentation.
 * Machine Learning & AI: Design, build, and deploy machine learning models that optimize various business functions such as inventory management, supply chain optimization, dynamic pricing, and personalized customer recommendations.
 * Strategic Insights: Translate large, complex datasets into actionable insights and strategic recommendations that align with business goals. Present findings to senior leadership and other stakeholders.
 * Mentorship & Leadership: Lead and mentor junior data scientists and analysts, fostering a culture of data-driven decision-making across the organization.
 * Cross-functional Collaboration: Partner closely with product, engineering, marketing, and operations teams to ensure data solutions are integrated into business workflows and product offerings.
 * A/B Testing & Experimentation: Design and implement A/B tests to measure the impact of new features, marketing campaigns, and other key business decisions.
 * Data Infrastructure: Collaborate with engineering teams to improve and scale Buymed’s data infrastructure and ensure the availability of clean, accurate data for analysis.
 * Reporting & Visualization: Build and maintain dashboards and reports to track key performance metrics, ensuring insights are easily accessible to both technical and non-technical teams.

Requirements:

 * Educational Background: Bachelor’s or Master’s degree (PhD preferred) in Data Science, Computer Science, Statistics, Mathematics, or a related field.
 * Experience:
 * 5+ years of experience in data science, with a proven track record of solving complex problems and driving measurable business impact.
 * Experience in leading data science projects, mentoring junior team members, and working cross-functionally with product and engineering teams.
 * Technical Skills:
 * Advanced proficiency in Python or R and strong SQL skills for querying and manipulating large datasets.
 * Expertise in machine learning frameworks such as TensorFlow, PyTorch, Scikit-learn.
 * Experience with cloud platforms (AWS, Google Cloud, or Azure) and big data technologies (e.g., Spark, Hadoop).
 * Strong background in statistics, probability, and mathematical modeling.
 * Experience with data visualization tools such as Tableau, PowerBI, or similar.
 * Analytical Thinking: Demonstrated ability to break down complex problems, build robust models, and deliver actionable insights.
 * Communication Skills: Ability to effectively communicate technical information to non-technical stakeholders, including senior management.
 * Project Management: Experience leading multiple projects from inception to execution, ensuring alignment with business objectives.
 * Team Player: Proven ability to work collaboratively in a team environment and drive results across different departments.

Preferred Qualifications:

 * Experience in the healthcare or pharmaceutical industry, with a strong understanding of market dynamics and data.
 * Expertise in developing pricing strategies and inventory optimization models.
 * Prior experience working in a fast-paced, growth-stage startup environment.
 * Familiarity with natural language processing (NLP) and advanced deep learning techniques.

What We Offer:

 * Leadership Opportunities: As a senior team member, you’ll play a crucial role in shaping the data strategy and team culture at Buymed.
 * Impact: Work on high-impact projects that drive growth in the rapidly expanding healthcare and pharmaceutical sector.
 * Professional Growth: Opportunities for continuous learning and career development, including access to cutting-edge tools and technologies.
 * Competitive Compensation: A highly competitive salary and benefits package, including bonuses based on performance.
 * Collaborative Culture: Be part of a supportive, forward-thinking team that values data-driven innovation
